loans.name: Emilia

texts.es: Emilia tiene 49 años, esta casado con José D. 50 años, con quien tiene 6 hijos. Juntos residen en la comunidad D. Sta. Rosa Alta del distrito D. Sivia. Emilia, sabe lo difícil que es para una familia D. pocos recursos empezar un negocio desD. cero, es así que ella y su familia optó por emprender un negocio propio, y que es la producción D. cacao y café injertados. Considera que este negocio le es bastante rentable, ya que dentro D. su comuna son muchos los productores D. cacao por lo que debe procurar en tener una mejor producción que los demás. Ahora con las ganancias obtenidas le da más motivación para continuar intensificándose en este trabajo, con el fin D. ofrecer un mejor bienestar a su familia. En un futuro, piensa adquirir un terreno para luego construir su casa propia que tanto ella anhela. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en ser puntual con el pago D. sus cuotas. Con los 3.000 soles que solicita, desea invertir para la compra D. materiales e instalar un vivero.
texts.en:
Emilia is 49 years old.  She is married to 50 year-old José and the couple have six children.  They live together in the community of Santa Rosa Alta, in Sivia district.

Emilia knows how difficult it is for a family of limited economic means to start a business from scratch.  She and her family chose to set up their own business producing grafted cacao and coffee plants.  She considers this business to be quite profitable.  There are many cacao producers in her community and so she must try to have a better production than everybody else.  The profits she has obtained from her business have given her more motivation to continue intensifying her work in this field, with the goal of providing her family with a better level of well-being.  In the future, she plans to acquire a plot of land on which she will build the home that she so longs for.

This is Emilia's second loan from MFP and she pledges to be punctual in making her loan repayments.  She would like to invest the 3,000 Peruvian soles that she has requested to buy the materials she needs to set up a plant nursery.

loans.use: to buy materials to set up a plant nursery

loans.name: Haydee Victoria

texts.es:
Haydee tiene  41 años de edad, actualmente viven en casa alquilada, cuenta con dos  hijo de 3  y 10 años de edad. El lugar donde radica en el distrito de Chepén en el departamento de la  La Libertad.
al norte del Perú, donde se disfruta de hermosos paisajes y una exquisita gastronomía.

Haydee se dedica a brindar el servicio de la venta de desayunos y menús, trabajo al que se dedica desde hace mas de 2  años , adquiriendo experiencia y clientela fija para sus negocio. Sus clientes son personas foráneas del lugar, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos de su casa
     
Por eso ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar insumos para la preparación de sus comidas y así pueda ofrecer una variedad de platos, también para mejorar su negocio comprando mas asientos para que las personas que lleguen a comer allí se sientan cómodos, satisfechos con la atención y el servicio. Haydee con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado la confianza y el respeto de sus vecinos, demostrando las ganas de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Haydee, 41, lives in a rented home.  She has 2 children aged 3 and 10.  She lives in the Chepen district of the department of La Libertad.  This is an area in the northern part of Peru, where one can enjoy the beautiful countryside and exquisite cuisine.

Haydee has a business selling breakfasts and meals, and she has been doing this work for more than 2 years, acquiring experience and regular customers for her business.  Her customers are people from outside of the area.  With the income she earns, she is able to cover the household expenses.

Haydee has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 Peruvian soles to buy supplies to make her meals, so that she can offer a variety of dishes.  In addition, she will use the loan to improve her business by purchasing more seats for the people who come to eat there, so that they will feel comfortable and satisfied with the service provided.  

Haydee has gained the trust and respect of her neighbors with her hard work, and her strong desire to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare her dishes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an electric sewing machine.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix tiene 30 años, convive con Nelly de 25 años, con quien tiene 2 hijas. Juntos residen en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Sta. Rosa Alta del distrito de Sivia. Félix es una persona que se caracteriza por tener muchos proyectos, pero él asegura que debe realizarlo con mucha cautela, para llegar a cumplir su meta. Es por ello que empezó cultivando cacao, actividad que lo realiza con su esposa. A medida que sus ventas incrementaron, incursionó en la producción de cacao injertado, pues el desarrollo de este fruto es más grande de lo normal y crecen en un menor tiempo. Hasta el momento lo que ha producido no le basta, es por ello que espera ampliar su siembra de esta planta, pues aún tiene tierras que le falta sembrar. Además se siente tranquila por que sabe que una vez llegue la cosecha, su familia le dará su apoyo en la extracción de sus frutos. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por el que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2.500 soles que solicita, desea comprar más plantas de cacao.
texts.en: Félix is 30 years old and lives with his partner Nelly, 25 years old, with whom he has 2 daughters.  Together they live in their own house located in the Santa Rosa Alta community in the district of Sivia.  Félix is a person who has many projects, but he asserts that he has to undertake them with great caution in order to meet his goal.  This is why he started growing cacao, an activity that he carries out with his spouse.  As his sales grew, he moved into the production of grafted cacao, since this fruit grows larger than normal and grows in a shorter amount of time.  Up to this point, what he has grown has not been enough for him. That is why he hopes to increase the amount of this plant that he sows, since he still has fields that are not planted.  Also, he feels calm because he knows that once the harvest time comes, his family will help him to bring in the produce.  This is his second loan with MFP, and he promises to make his payments on time.  With the 2,500 soles he is asking for, he would like to buy more cacao plants.

loans.use: to purchase cacao plants.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es:
Rogelio tiene 28 años de edad, cuenta con casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío José Olaya del distrito de Tambogrande, dicho caserío   se encuentra en la parte rural  de este distrito. Y no cuanta con servicio básicos

Rogelio se dedica principalmente a la crianza de ganado ovino y a la crianza de cerdos los cuales cría y engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado local, adicionalmente cuenta con 1.5 has de terreno agrícola que su padre le ha dado como herencia donde tiene limón que cosecha semanalmente 

Rogelio esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de más animales con su respectivo alimento balanceados que ayude al engorde de ovinos y cerdos logrando un mejor peso y tamaño, de esta manera el podrá venderlos a un mejor precio, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.

Rogelio  es un hombre responsable y trabajador que con esfuerzo desea que su familia salga adelante y que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Rogelio is 28 years old and owns his own home, which is located in the village of Jose Olaya, district of Tambogrande.  The village is in a rural part of this district and doesn't have basic services.

Rogelio is primarily engaged in raising sheep and pigs.  He breeds them and fattens them, and later places them on the local market.  He also has 1.5 hectares of agricultural land that his father has given him as an inheritance.  The land has a lemon crop that he harvests weekly.

Rogelio is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 2000 nuevos soles to buy more animals and animal feed to help fatten the sheep and pigs.  This will help them to achieve a better weight and size, so Rogelio can sell them at a better price.  This investment will enable his business to continue growing and improve his quality of life.

Rogelio is a responsible hard-worker who wants his family to succeed and give his children a better future.

loans.use: to buy more animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Gonzalo De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Gonzalo toda su vida a trabajado en el campo con la cría de terneros y cabras para así poder sostener su familia que está conformada por 12 hijos.

Fue con este negocio como Gonzalo ha podido darles estudio  a sus hijos y además ha podido tener una buena  calidad de vida.

Su negocio está ubicado en la parte de atrasa de su casa y para poder mejorar sus ingresos el necesita comprar mas animales para criarlos y luego venderlos, además el quiere ver su negocio mas grande y así poder tener nuevos clientes.
texts.en:
Gonzalo has been working in the country all his life, breeding calves and goats to be able to provide for his family, composed of 12 children.

It’s thanks to this activity that Gonzalo has been able to offer an education to his children as well as to reach a good standard of living. 

He runs his activity at the back of his house, and in order to increase his income he needs to buy more animals that he will breed and then sell. He would also like to expand his activity in order to gain new customers.

loans.use: To buy livestock.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Ana, tiene 53 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 8 hijos, todos son mayores de edad tres de ellos aun viven en su casa, el menor estudia en universidad. El marido es albañil.
 
Nuestra amiga tiene una papelería y copiadora en su casa, en ella vende útiles escolares, además de aguas, helados, sodas, jugos y ciertas golosinas y bocadillos de picar, nos cuenta que su negocio está cerca de una escuela y aprovecha vender y realizar sus trabajos a los estudiantes de dicho plantel, lleva en su negocio por más de 15 años y lo ha ido mejorando gracias a los créditos.
 
Este crédito es para comprar útiles escolares, papel, sodas, jugos,  entre otras cosas. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde el segundo ciclo que se formo este grupo y le gusta por los otros créditos que brinda la institución.

Sus sueños son seguir trabajando y mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
In Crucita parish in the canton of Portviejo, we find a place known as "Los Arenales."  Here the members of the communal bank "Nueva Generacion" meet every 15 days.  This place is known for its beautiful beaches, its cuisine and the quality of its people.

Here we meet Ana, who is 55 and is in a common-law marriage.  Ana has 8 children who are all adults.  Three of them still live in her house, and the youngest is studying at the university.  Her husband is a bricklayer.

Our friend has a stationery store and copier in her home where she sells school supplies as well as water, ice cream, sodas, juices and some sweets and snacks.  She tells us that her business is close to a school, and she takes advantage of this to sell to the students at that campus.  She has had this business for 15 years, and it has been improving, thanks to the loans she has invested in it.

This loan will be used to buy school supplies, paper, sodas, juices, and other items.  She has been in her communal bank since the group's second loan cycle, and she likes it because of the other loans that the institution provides.

Her dreams are to continue working and improving her business.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, paper, sodas, juices, etc.

loans.name: Froilana

texts.es: Froilana tiene 62 años, es viuda pero vive con sus 2 hijos en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad D. Sta. Rosa Alta del distrito ecológico D. Sivia. Froilana al ver que los vecinos D. su comuna se ganaban la vida en el campo, no quiso desaprovechar, es por eso que incursionó en la siembra D. cacao y café; productos que no hay mucha competencia en su zona. Hoy le va muy bien, además que le proporciona buenos dividendos no descuida D. los gastos D. su hogar y la D. sus hijos. Él reconoce que este trabajo requiere D. mucho esfuerzo, por ello cuando llega la temporada D. cosecha debe contratar peones para facilitar la extracción D. estos frutos. Lo que más anhela es tener capital para invertir en su chacra, y con las mismas ganas y entusiasmo que lo caracteriza, desea mejorar las técnicas D. cultivo para así tener una mejor producción D. café y cacao. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete en ser puntual en el pago D. sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 soles que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra D. sacos D. abono orgánico para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en: Froilana is 62 years old and widowed.  She lives with her two children in her own house located in the Santa Rosa Alta community in the ecological district of Sivia. Froilana, upon seeing that her neighbors were earning a living in the fields, refused to fall behind.  She thus began growing cacao and coffee, products for which there is not much competition in her area.  Now it is going very well for her, and it also brings her good profits so she does not neglect her household expenses and those of her children.  She recognizes that this work requires a lot of effort, so when harvest time comes she has to hire laborers to facilitate the harvest of this produce.  What she most longs for is to have capital to invest in her farm, and with the same desire and enthusiasm that characterize her, she wants to improve her cultivation methods to have a better harvest of coffee and cacao.  This is her second loan with MFP, and she promises to be punctual in her payments.  With the 3,000 soles she is asking for, she will purchase sacks of organic fertilizer to fertilize her fields.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge aprendió de su padre a trabajar la tierra, el desde muy joven trabajaba como jornalero en las fincas de café y gracias a su trabajo en ellas hoy día tiene su propia tierra con un sembrado de café que le proporciona tener el sustento diario para su familia conformada por 3 hijos.

El también trabaja como ayudante de construcción los fines de semana y sus hijos le ayudan en el cultivo para así poderlo cuidar y poner bien bonito para sacar una buena cosecha.

Para mantener su cultivo el necesita ferlitizantes y abonos que lo protejan de las plagas, además así cuando haya cosecha puede vender el café a buen precio y aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Jorge learned from his father how to work the land. He worked as a day laborer on the coffee plantations starting when he was very young, and thanks to his work there, he now has his own land where he plants coffee. This provides him and his family, composed of 3 children, with the daily bread.

He also works in the construction business as an assistant during the week-ends, and his children help him with the crop so that it is well cared for and of good quality to then get a good harvest.

To preserve his crops, he needs fertilizers and manure to protect them from blight, so that once harvested he can sell coffee at a good price and increase his income.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Marlene Isabel

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Marlene, tiene 44 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, dos de ellos mayores de edad y tres de  16, 14 y 8 años, uno de los mayores estudian en Universidad, dos en colegio y el ultimo en escuela. El marido de dedica a la pesca. Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace más de tres años y le gusta porque con los créditos le ayuda a su marido.

Ella realiza el crédito para el negocio del esposo el cual además de dedicarse a la pesca también se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado, el trabaja todos los días ya que dos días a la semana sale de pesca y los otros días se dedica a comprar pescado a pescadores de su zona para luego entregarlos a comerciantes que llegan hasta las playas a comprar el pescado para luego llevarlos a los mercados de Portoviejo y de  Manta. Lleva más de 20 años dedicado a esta profesión de comerciante y a la pesca desde mucho más tiempo.

Este crédito es para comprar pescado.

Sus sueños son tener un trabajo y así poder ganarse algo propio.
texts.en:
In the parish of Crucita in the Portoviejo canton, we find a place known Los Arenales. Every two week s the members of the Nueva Generación [New Generation] credit group meet. This place is known for its beautiful beaches, its cuisine and the warmth of its people.  

Here we meet Marlene. She is 44 years old and is in a common law marriage with five children. Two of them are adults and three are 16,14, and 8. One of the older ones is in college, two are in college, two in high school and the youngest is in elementary school. Her husband is a fisherman. She has been in She has been in the credit group for three years and she likes it because she helps her husband with the loans.  

She is taking out the loan for her husband's business. In addition to fishing, he also buys and sells fish. He works every day, since two days a week he goes fishing and the rest of the time he buys fish from area fishermen and delivers it to merchants who come to the beaches to buy fish and take it to the markets Portoviejo and Manta. He has been a merchant for more than 20 years and a fisherman for much longer. 

This loan is to buy fish.

Her dreams are to have a job and thus earn something of her own.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Meliton

texts.es: Melitón tiene 40 años, convive con sabina de 32, fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hijos. Juntos residen en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Sta. Rosa Alta del distrito de Sivia. Desde hace 15 años,  Melitón decidió incursionar en la actividad agrícola, específicamente en el  cultivo de café, con el fin de tener un sustento económico y ofrecer bienestar a su familia. Actualmente esta contento con el trabajo que realiza, ya que desde siempre le ha gustado la agricultura. Recuerda que empezó con una pequeña parcela de cultivo, hoy en día tiene buenas extensiones de terreno, y estos gracias al esfuerzo y tenacidad que lo caracteriza. Por otro lado su esposa e hijos siempre la apoyan, pero en tiempos de cosecha necesita de algunos peones que le puedan facilitar la extracción de sus frutos. Usualmente lo que cosecha los lleva al distrito de Sivia, para que los pueda vender a un precio competitivo. En el futuro piensa adquirir más terrenos con el propósito de aumentar su producción. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 soles que solicita, contratará peones para que le ayuden en limpiar su parcela de la maleza que crece y perjudica sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Meliton is 40 and lives with Sabina who is 32.  They have 2 children together. They reside in their own home located in the community of Santa Rosa Alta, District of Sivia. For 15 years, Meliton decided to enter farming, specifically the cultivation of coffee, to have a livelihood and provide for his family. He is happy with the work he has done, as he always liked farming. 

Meliton remembers when he began with a small plot of crops, and today he has large tracts of land, which he acquired through effort and tenacity.  His wife and children will always help him, but in harvest times he needs some laborers that can help in the process of extracting the fruit. Usually he takes the harvest to the Sivia district, so he can sell at a competitive price. In the future, Meliton plans to acquire more land in order to increase production. 

This is Meliton's second loan with MFP, and he agrees to be prompt in paying his dues. With the 3,000 soles requested, he will hire laborers to assist him in clearing his land of  growing weeds that damage his crops.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Maria Del Consuelo

texts.es: María del Consuelo y su esposo cuentan con negocio de la venta de hamburguesas, tacos y tortas el cual tiene un año establecido. La venta la realiza los día Jueves, Viernes, Sábados y Domingos ya que son lo días qua mas se vende su producto. La pareja atiende a sus clientes con amabilidad  y limpieza pues este negocio es una fuente más de ingreso para el sostén familiar. El crédito que solicita es para comprar producto para elaboración de su venta.
texts.en: María del Consuelo and her husband have a business, which has established one year, selling burgers, tacos and cakes  They sell on Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday as these are the days that they sell more products. The couple serves its customers with kindness and cleanliness because this business is a source of income for them. The requested loan is to purchase products to sell for their business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Natalia siempre ha vivido en el campo y desde hace 9 que se casó con su esposo pusieron la cría de pollo y la venta de huevos para el sustento de su familia.

Ella tiene 2 hijos que le ayudan luego de estudiar en la escuela para así poder enseñarles esta labor para cuando sena grandes.

Natalia quiere tener un galpón mas grande para pollos y así poder tener muchos mas para el engorde y al venderlos se incrementaran sus ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Natalia has always lived in the country, and after marrying nine years ago she and her husband began raising chickens and selling eggs as a means of family income.

She has two children who help her after school so she can teach them the trade for when they grow up.

Natalia wants to have a larger  so she can raise more to increase her income and improve her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy chickens.

loans.name: Paulita

texts.es: Paulita es una mujer muy emprendedora que a pesar de la situación económica que esta en el país, cuenta con su negocio de venta de ropa usada de buena calidad que ofrece a sus amistades y vecinos aun bajo precio. Paulita es madre de dos pequeños a los cuales quiere ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida por tal motivo  opto por dedicarse al negocio que instala solo los fines de semana con el fin de no descuidar a su familia y quehaceres del hogar. El negocio ha permanecido 8 años por la atención que ofrece y amabilidad al atender a sus clientes, esta es parte de su fuente de ingresos a parte la que su esposo gana por trabajar en maquiladora. Para que el negocio siga generando ingresos necesita comprar mercancía de temporada.
texts.en: Paulita is a very enterprising woman who, despite the economic situation in the country, has a business selling good quality used clothing that she offers to her friends and neighbors at an even lower price. Paulita is the mother of two little ones who wants to provide them a better quality of life.  For that reason, she chooses to have a business that operates only on weekends in order not to neglect her family and household chores. The business has been operating for 8 years because of the care and kindness she offers to serve her customers.  This business is part of their source of income apart from what her ​​husband earns working in a factory. In order for the business to continue generating income, she needs to purchase seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to buy seasonal merchandise.

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

La señora Rosa es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito. Tiene  40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 2 hijos de 16 y 12 años de edad los mismos que estudian en  escuela y colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ellos tienen un negocio de venta de pescado y mariscos en su casa, nos cuenta que dia a dia ella en la madrugada se va hasta las playas de Los Arenales donde llegan los pescadores con sus productos, allí  compra los mariscos y el pescado para luego limpiarlos y venderlos en su local, trabaja todos los días desde hace 15 años y nos cuenta que le ha ido muy bien aunque hay temporadas que el negocio baja un poco pero luego vuelve a subir y le quedan buenos ingresos. 
 
Este crédito es para comprar más pescado, camarón, langostinos, entre otras muchas variedades de mariscos.
 
Su sueño  seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Nueva Generación” (New Generation) meets every 15 days in a place called “Los Arenales” in the parish of Crucita in the canton of Portoviejo. This place is known for its beautiful beaches, its food, and the caliber of its people.

Sra. Rosa is a founding member of the Communal Bank and likes the fact that the interest rates are much lower than other credit institutions. She is 40 years old, married, and has two children (ages 16 and 12) who are attending school. Her husband is a merchant.

Rosa and her husband have a business selling fish and seafood from their home. She says that every day at dawn, she goes to the beaches of Los Arenales where the fishermen arrive with their products. There she buys seafood and fish, which she will later clean and sell at her shop. Rosa has worked every day for the past 15 years and says that she has done very well even though her business is seasonal. Sales will drop a little bit and then later go back up so she can earn a good income.

This loan will be used to buy more fish, shrimp, prawns, and other types of seafood. Her dream is to continue growing in her business.

loans.use: to buy fish, shrimp, prawns, and other types of seafood.

loans.name: Hermes

texts.es:
Hermes tiene  41 años de edad, el vive en un caserío del distrito de Tambogrande en el departamento de Piura, en el norte del Perú, por vivir en una zona rural la vivienda de Hermes aun no cuenta con  cuanta con servicio básicos.

Hermes cuenta con 1 hectáreas de terreno agrícola en el cual siembra limón y cosecha semanalmente, también cuenta con ganado ovino el cual cría en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio y posteriormente  comercializa en el mercado  local 

Hermes  desea comprar fertilizantes para su cultivo de limón y así lograr una mejor producción de su cultivo,ademas también quiere comprar alimento balanceado para sus animales, lo que permitirá que logren un mejor peso y tamaño y venderlos a un mejor precio,por ello está solicitando un préstamo a  Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles. 

Hermes  es conocido en la zona por ser una persona trabajadora, responsable y desea más adelante poder seguir creciendo en sus negocios.
texts.en:
Hermes is 41 years old and lives in a small village in Tambogrande district, in Piura department, in the north of Peru.  As he lives in a rural area, Hermes' home does not have basic services.

Hermes has 1 hectare of farmland where he grows lemons and harvests them weekly.  He also owns sheep which he raises in pens located behind his home.  He later sells them in the local market.

Hermes would like to buy fertilizers for his lemon crop and thereby achieve a better production.  He would also like to buy balanced feed for his animals which will mean they will achieve a better size and weight and he will be able to sell them for a better price.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Hermes is well known in the area as a hard-working, responsible person and, in the future, he would like to be able to continue growing in his businesses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his crops and balanced feed for his sheep

loans.name: Oscar Alonso

texts.es:
Oscar aprendió a reparar electrodomésticos desde muy joven ya que su familia se ha dedicado a esta labor y es así como su padre pudo sacarlos adelante.

El señor Oscar quiere ampliar su negocio para así poder continuar pagándole a sus hijos los estudios universitarios y para esto necesita mantener repuestos para todo tipo de electrodomésticos y así poder ofrecerle mayor rapidez a sus clientes en la reparación de los mismos.
texts.en:
Oscar learned to repair domestic appliances when he was very young since his family worked in the trade and his father was able to support them through his work.

Oscar wants to expand his business so he can afford to pay for a college education for his children.  To do this he must stock repair parts for every type of appliance so he can offer a quick repair service to his customers.

loans.use: To buy repair parts.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Rosa, tiene 55 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija de 25 años que está casada y vive junto al esposo y su pequeña hija en la casa de nuestra socia. Su marido es agricultor. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 18 años y le gusta por los diferentes créditos que ofrece la Fundación Espoir.

Ella como buena mujer se dedica junto a su esposo a la agricultura, siembra cultivos de ciclo corto como melón, arroz, maíz, pimiento. Además también se dedica  a la cría de pollos, Trabajan de lunes a viernes desde las 07h00 hasta las 16h00, con ellos trabajan dos personas a los que les pagan un sueldo semanal. Nos cuenta que su producción la venden a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa de igual forma sucede con los pollos. Aunque también vende por su casa por libras.

Este nuevo crédito es para comprar semillas, insumos agrícolas, fertilizantes y alimento para pollos.

Sus sueños son seguir adelante y gozar de  buena salud ella y su familia.
texts.en:
In the parish of Crucita in Portoviejo canton, we find a place known as Los Arenales ["The Sands''] Here, every fifteen days, the members of the Nueva Generación [New Generation] communal bank meet. The area is known for its beautiful beaches, its cuisine and the warmth of its people. 

In this place we meet Rosa, who is 55 years old. She has a common-law husband, with whom she has a 25-year-old daughter. The daughter is married and lives with her husband and small daughter in Rosa's home. Rosa's husband is a farmer. Rosa has been in the communal bank for 18 years, and she likes it because of the various loans offered by the Espoir Foundation.

As a good partner, she works side by side with her husband in agriculture, planting short-cycle crops such as melons, rice, corn and peppers. She also works raising chickens. They work from Monday to Friday from 7 a.m. to 4 p.m.  They have two people working with them, to whom they pay a weekly salary. Rosa reports that they sell their harvest to buyers who come to their home. The same thing happens with the chickens; however, Rosa also sells them from her house by the pound. 

This new loan is to buy seeds, farm supplies, fertilizers and chicken feed. 

Rosa's dreams are to get ahead, enjoy good health and keep her family healthy.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farm supplies, fertilizers and chicken feed.

loans.name: Ines Milagros

texts.en:
Ines Milagros is 33 years old and married with three children. She rents a small stand in a market in which she sells different kinds of pastries such as sweet breads and small cakes. Her specialty is arroz con leche (a rice pudding) which she also sells at her stand.

Ines Milagros is asking for a loan so that she may buy more ingredients to make pastries. Specifically, she plans to purchase sugar, flour, and oil. She works everyday from 6am to 6pm selling her pastries. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, and oil to make pastries

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto aprendió la labor de las colmenas desde sus 20 años gracias a su tío, que cuando fallece le hereda el negocio y con este es con el que ha podido mantener a su familia.

El genera en cada cosecha de miel varios empleos y por esto el quiere crecer su negocios para así poder darle a otras personas trabajo y además mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.

El se sueña con un gran negocio para cuando conforme su familia y tenga sus hijos heredarles el negocio y así puedan seguir trabajando y generar empleo a otras personas.
texts.en:
Rigoberto learned the art of beekeeping in his 20s, thanks to his uncle.  When he passed away, he willed the business to him and it has allowed him to support his family.

Several employees harvest honey and he wants to grow the business in order to provide jobs to other people.  He also wants to increase his income and improve his quality of life.  He dreams of having a grand business so that when he forms his family and has children, they will be able to inherit the business and also create jobs for others.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Edita Elirita

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Edita, ella tiene 58 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 8 hijos todos son mayores de edad, con ellos viven dos  nietos que los crió desde pequeñitos y que son como sus hijos ellos tienen 16 y 10 años, el mayor estudia en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su marido es comerciante. 

Ella tiene una tienda de comestibles en su casa, vende desde arroz, azúcar, carne, pescado, camarón, queso y también ciertos remedios y artículos de bazar, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 18h00. Nos cuenta que tiene  su tienda hace treinta años y  que esta le permitió  ganarse la vida y también estar al tanto de las necesidades de sus hijos y de sus nietos. Los productos los compra en la ciudad de Portoviejo aunque la mayoría los recibe en su local.

Este crédito es comprar arroz, azúcar, atún, detergentes, artículos de papelería y otros productos. Lleva  12 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los beneficios que ha recibido de la institución.
 
Su sueño es que su tienda siga creciendo.
texts.en:
In the parish of Crucita of the Portoviejo canton, we find a place known as Los Arenales. Here the Nueva Generación credit group meets every two weeks. This place is known for its beautiful beaches, its cuisine and the warmth of its people.

Here we meet Edita. She is 58 years old, married and has 8 children. All of them are grown. Two grand children live with them whom she has raised since they were small and are like her own children. They are 16 and 10. The oldest is in high school and the youngest in elementary school. Her husband is a merchant.   

She has a store in her house. She sells rice, sugar, meat, fish, shrimp, cheese as well as certain remedies and variety store items. She works every day from 6:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. She tells us that she has had her store for thirty years and this has allowed her to earn a living and also keep up with her children's and grandchildren's needs. She buys the products in the city of Portoviejo although she receives most of them at her locale. 

This loan is to buy rice, sugar, tuna, detergents, paper products and more. She has been in the credit group for 12 years and she likes the benefits she has received from the institution. 
 
Her dream is for her store to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, tuna, detergents, paper items and other products.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es: Rolando tiene 33 años, es soltero, vive solo en su casa que es propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Santa Rosa Alta del distrito de Sivia. En años anteriores Rolando  vendía panes por la calles de su comunidad, pero en vista que no lo daba resultados, decidió emprender un nuevo proyecto, en este caso se trata del cultivo de Cacao y frutas Cítricas, en donde le está otorgando buenos beneficios económicos. Usualmente trabaja en su chacra de Lunes a Sábado a partir de las 7:00 AM hasta las 6:00 PM, además recibe la ayuda de sus padres y hermanos, pero por lo general tiene a cargo peones que le puedan facilitar tanto en la siembra como en la cosecha. En un futuro cercano quiere seguir apostando en abrir una Panadería. Rolando esta feliz con las labores agrícolas que realiza por que le genera buen ingreso económico. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que Rolando se compromete a realizar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Rolando esta agradecido a todos los de su banco comunal por permitirle ser parte de ello. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles que solicita, comprará fertilizantes para su terreno ya esta próximo su siguiente siembra.
texts.en:
Rolando is 33 years old and single.  He lives alone in his own home which is located in Santa Rosa Alta community, in Sivia district.

Rolando used to sell bread in the streets of his community but, as that business didn't provide good results, he decided to undertake a new project.  He started to grow cacao and citrus fruits which are making him good financial returns.  He usually works on his farm from Monday to Saturday, from 7.00am to 6.00pm.  He also receives help from his parents and his siblings.  However, he generally works with laborers who help him with his sowing and harvesting.  In the near future, he would like to open a bakery.

Rolando is happy with the farming work that he does as it makes him a good income.  This is his first loan through MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time.  Rolando is grateful to all the members of his community bank for allowing him to become a member.  He will use the 3,000 Peruvian soles that he is requesting to buy fertilizers for his land for the upcoming sowing season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Margarita Isabel

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas,  por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Margarita, tiene 54 años  de edad, está soltera y  vive con su mamá y su hermana. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde el inicio aunque luego se retiró pero regreso porque los créditos son una gran ayuda en su negocio.

Nuestra amiga lleva más 30 años administrando un bar en una escuela de su localidad, en el vende todo tipo de productos preparados por ella, nos cuenta que solo vende comida saludable para que los niños tengan un buen desarrollo, allí vende corviches, empanadas, arroz con pollo, ensalada de frutas, ceviches entre otras cosas deliciosas, nos cuenta nuestra amiga que trata de no repetir sus productos en la semana para darles más variedad y que sus niños estén contentos, próximamente espera comprar lo necesario para poder vender almuerzos para los profesores que tienen que quedarse hasta más tarde.

Este crédito es para comprar víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos y frutas para los jugos.
 
Su sueño es seguir dando lo mejor a los niños que son sus mejores clientes..
texts.en:
In the Portoviejo settlement of the Crucita parish we find a place known as “Los Arenales.”  This is where the members of the “Nueva Generación” get together every two weeks.  This place is known for its beautiful beaches, it’s food, and the warmness of its people.


Here we meet Margarita.  She is 54 years old, single and lives with her mother and sister.  She was part of the group since it began, left, and then rejoined because the loans are of great help for her business.

Our friend has been running a pub at a local school for more than 30 years, where she sells all types of products that she prepares.  She says that she only sells healthy food so that the children develop well.  She sells corviches, empanadas, chicken with rice, fruit salads, and ceviches, among other delicious things.  She also says that she tries not to sell the same things daily so that she can keep the kids happy by giving them a variety.  Now she wants to buy what she needs in order to sell lunches for the teachers who have to stay until the evenings.

She will use the money from this loan to buy ingredients to prepare her food and also fruits for juices.  Her dream is to continue giving the best to the children who are her best customers.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and fruit.

loans.name: Etelvina

texts.en:
Etelvina is 36 years old and lives with her partner. She has two children who are still living with her while they attend high school. She has a business selling typical Peruvian dishes on the street. Specifically, she sells coto relleno and french fries with chile.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy more ingredients for her food such as potatoes, rice, and chiles. She works everyday selling her food on the street. Etelvina is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more potatoes, rice, and chiles to make food to sell

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is 70 years old and the single mother of six children. For a living, she raises animals to sell such as guinea pigs, pigs and chickens. After they are fully grown, she brings them to a market to sell them. In addition, Dominga rents a small stand in the Cusco bus terminal where she sells traditional Peruvian food from 6 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy more pigs, guinea pigs, and chickens that she can raise and eventually sell. Dominga is a very hardworking woman and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more pigs, guinea pigs, and chickens to sell

loans.name: Elsa Mariflor

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Elsa, tiene 52 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos ya todos mayores de edad, pero el menor de ellos  aun vive con ella. El marido se dedica a la pesca. Nuestra amiga lleva cinco ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella se financia cada vez que los recibe.

Ella tiene un negocio de compra y ventas de pinchaguas,  esta es una variedad de pez muy solicitada por las personas y por los dueños de negocios de ceviches, ya que con este producto ellos preparan el delicioso ceviche de pinchaguas que es muy apreciado  por los clientes, ella compra a los pescadores en Los  Arenales, los mismos que luego se encarga de limpiarlos y curtirlas con limón para luego entregarlas en tarrinas plásticas a sus clientes, trabaja todos los días en las mañanas, lleva más de cinco años que se dedica a esta actividad que le deja muy buenos ingresos.
 
Este crédito es para comprar más pinchaguas (pescado) y embases plásticos. 

Sus sueños son seguir adelante y aumentar su negocio.
texts.en:
In the Crucita parish, in Portoviejo Canton, we find a place known as "Los Arenales".  The members of the “Nueva Generación” (New Generation) Communal Bank meet here every two weeks. This area is known for its beautiful beaches, gastronomy, and the warmth of its people.

This is where we meet Elsa, age 52.  She is in a common-law marriage, and she has four children.  They are all adults now, but the youngest still lives with her.  Her husband is a fisherman.  

She has been in her communal bank for five cycles.  She likes it because she funds the business every time she receives a loan. 

She has a business of buying and selling “pinchaguas” (alewife fish).  This is a very popular variety among people and ceviche (raw, marinated fish) business owners.  They use the product to prepare the delicious “ceviche de pinchaguas”, which is very popular with the customers.  

She buys from the fisherman in Los Arenales.  She then takes charge of cleaning them with lemon.  She later delivers them in plastic containers to her customers.  She works every day in the mornings.  She has been doing this for over five years, and it gives her very good income.

This loan is to buy “pinchaguas” (fish) and plastic containers.

Her dream is to get ahead and to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish and plastic containers.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel is 36 years old and married with two daughters. They are 8 months and 7 years old. Her occupation is selling clothes in the street and at various markets around the city of Cusco. She sells all types of clothes but specializes in women's undergarments.

 Isabel is asking for a loan in order to buy more women's underpants and brassieres to sell. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more women's undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.es: La Sra. Jacinta es casada, tiene 3 hijos de 15,13 y 05 años de edad. Los 2 mayores están en etapa escolar. La cliente se dedica a la venta de abarrotes (azúcar, arroz, aceite, fideos, etc.), su pequeña tienda se encuentra ubicada en su casa, trabaja en ella desde hace 2 años. La Sra. Jacinta eligió este tipo de trabajo por ayudar a su esposo y tener un ingreso mas para el hogar. Los desafíos que enfrenta Jacinta es la salud de la niña menor, ya que por este tiempo hace demasiado frio, enfrenta su desafío teniendo mucho cuidado con la salud de la menor y de ellos mismos. El crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de mercadería para su tienda. Los sueños de Jacinta es ver crecer su negocio hasta que se convierta en una gran tienda de abarrotes. La Sra. es una persona muy emprendedora y muy optimista de salir adelante por sus hijos junto a su esposo, ella se encuentra muy agradecida por la oportunidad de crecer y alcanzar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Jacinta is married and has three children; ages 15, 13, and 5.  The two oldest are school age.  

She sells groceries (sugar, rice, oil, and noodles, etc.).  Her small store is located in her house.  She has been working in this business for two years.  Jacinta chose this type of work to help her husband and to have more income for the household. 

A challenge that Jacinta faces is her youngest daughter’s health.  At this time it is too cold.  She faces this challenge by being very careful with her daughter’s health as well as being careful with the rest of the family's health.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise for her store.

Jacinta’s dream is to see her business grown until it becomes a large grocery store.

She is a very enterprising person.  She is very optimistic about, together with her husband, getting her children ahead.

She is very grateful for the opportunity to grow and to reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients like rice, sugar, mixed vegetables, and meat, etc. in order to expand her business.

loans.name: Emerson

texts.es: Emerson tiene 23 años, convive con Roselda de 21 años y fruto de su amorío tienen 02 hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa situada en la ciudad de san francisco. Emerson a su corta edad tuvo su primer hijo y desde entonces cuenta con múltiples necesidades, es por ello que se esmera en trabajar arduamente en sus campos de cultivo donde siembra variedad de plantas como: cacao, café y palillo, las cuales después de cosecharlos los lleva a los puntos de acopio de distintas empresas, quienes sabiendo de la calidad de sus productos le remuneran muy bien por sus frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva 04 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es combatir los insectos que se apoderan de las flores de cada plantación, es por ello que tiene que combatirlos con insecticidas naturales para no dañar el medio ambiente. Con el crédito solicitado comprará sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras y volverlas muy fructíferas. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos por que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este es su primer crédito y esta muy contento de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su proyecto planeado y por ende se compromete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas programadas. Los 3,000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
23-year old Emerson lives with 21-year old Roselda and their two children in their own home located in the town of San Francisco. Emerson had his first son at a young age and since then has had many needs. For that reason he puts a lot of effort into his farm where he grows a variety of crops such as cocoa, coffee, and palillo. After harvesting the products, he takes them to the warehouses of several businesses where he is known for the quality of his crops and where he is paid well. 

The part Emerson most enjoys about his work is planting out his fields and making them fertile and productive. He’s been doing this work for four years. The most difficult part is dealing with the insects that attack the flowers. For this reason he has to destroy them by using natural insecticides so that the environment is not harmed. 

With the loan he is seeking, Emerson will buy bags of manure to fertilize his land and make it more productive. In the future he hopes to continue saving money to buy more land. This is his first loan and he is very happy to know that he has financial support to go ahead with his plans. He promises to repay the money punctually. The 3,000 sole loan will be used to buy organic fertlizer.

loans.use: to buy bags of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: Jaime tiene 22 años, natural de la comunidad de Vista Alegre Baja, Jaime convive con Elba de 19 años y fruto de esa relación esperan el nacimiento de su primer bebe. Jaime hoy mas que nunca se esmera en trabajar arduamente ya que sabe que su primer hijo esta en camino y por ello que cultiva con mucha laboriosidad sus plantas de cacao, café y frutos de piña, donde viene realizando su actividad desde sus 20 años con el apoyo de los jornaleros, menciona que desde niño aprendió a labrar la tierra gracias a la enseñanza de sus padres hoy trabaja sus propias tierras. Su producto más rentable es el fruto de la piña, porque gracias a ello logró comprar una mototaxi donde sus días no laborables aprovecha en prestar servicio de transporte. Los meses de Junio a Agosto son tiempos donde mayormente se siembra todo tipo de semillas, razón por la cual Jaime acude a la entidad Financiera para tramitar sus créditos y llevar consigo uno de sus propósitos sembrar más frutas de piña. Los planes que tiene en mente es seguir sembrando y adquiriendo más espacios de terreno para así sobresalir adelante. Este será su primer crédito con MFP y por lo cual necesita el apoyo para concretar sus planes a la vez se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus aportes de pago. Con el dinero del crédito podrá comprar más semillas de piña ya que desea implementar sus sembrios.
texts.en:
Jaime is 22 years old and from the community of Vista Alegre Baja.  He lives with 19 year-old Elba and they are awaiting their first baby.

Jaime, now more than ever, is ensuring that he works hard since he knows that his first child is on the way.  He is therefore growing his cacao, coffee and pineapple plants with a lot of care.  He has been working in this business since he was 20 years old, with the support of laborers.  He says that he learned to work the land when he was a young boy and, thanks to his parents' instruction, he now works his own land.  His most profitable product is his pineapples because they have enabled him to buy a motorcycle taxi which he provides a transport service with on his days off.  The months of June through August are when he mainly sows his seeds.  Jaime is turning to our financial institution for loans so that he can achieve one of his goals of sowing more pineapples.

Jaime's plans include continuing to sow his crops and acquiring more land so that he can get ahead in life.  This will be his first loan with MFP and he needs the support to carry out his plans.  He pledges to make his repayments on time.  Jaime will use his loan money to buy more pineapple seeds to start his sowing.

loans.use: to buy more pineapple seeds

loans.name: Benjamín

texts.es:
El señor Benjamín esta agradecido por su cooperación en el crédito anterior el cual pudo comprar la herramienta que necesitaba. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar una maquina donde le pueda el detectar el problema que traen los carro que le llevan para reparar y así poder arreglarlos mas rápido y así sus clientes estén mas satisfechos por su buen trabajo, y los recomiendan a su familiares y amistades. 
Planea pagar el con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio de mecánica automotriz  
Don Benjamín espero contar con su cooperación para este crédito y poder comprar el equipo que a su negocio le está haciendo falta.
texts.en:
Benjamin is grateful for the cooperation in his previous loan, in which he could buy the tool that he needed.  He is now requesting a loan to buy a machine that allows him to detect the problem in the cars brought to him to repair so he can fix them faster.  His clients will be more satisfied with his good work, and recommend him to their friends and family.

Benjamin plans to pay back the loan with the profits he gets from his auto mechanic business. He looks forward to your cooperation for this loan to purchase equipment that he is missing in his business.

loans.use: to buy equipment and tools for his business.

loans.name: María Carmen

texts.en: Maria is 72 years old and married with five children, all of whom are professionals and have moved out of the house. She is the owner of a small restaurant that sells typical Peruvian food such as "arroz con pollo", "lomo saltado", and "sopas". She is asking for a loan in order to expand her kitchen and purchase another oven. She plans to buy cement and other construction materials to expand her kitchen. She has had her restaurant for 16 years and has been very successful. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement and other materials to expand her restaurant kitchen and to purchase another oven.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ILLARY III”; este banco comunal pertenece al Distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia Cristina;  tiene 61 años de edad  y es conviviente la socia tiene 5 hijos de los cuales 3 son independientes; sus otros dos hijos tiene 27, 24  años de edad, La socia se dedica al comercio minorista,  la socia compra al por mayor ropa y lo vende, también compra billeteras, mochilas, la socia viaja a la ciudad de Lima para traer de las diferentes fabricas y cuando llega a Cusco lleva a ofrecer a las diferentes amistades que la socia tiene y también ofrece a las amistades de las mismas amigas de la socia, la socia se dedica a este negocio desde hace 2 años y le esta yendo muy bien ella desea poner una tienda de venta de ropa y accesorios  con sus hijos, pero de este modo le va muy bien y la socia con este negocio sigue apoyando a sus hijos en los estudios superiores. La socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de ropa al por mayor.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo que se le otorgara para poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Cristina belongs to the communal bank "Illary III."  This bank is located in the Huanchac district of Cusco province, in the department of Cusco.

Cristina is 61 years old and lives with a partner.  She has 5 children, 3 of whom are independent.  Her other 2 children are 27 and 24 years old.  Cristina works in retail trade.  She buys clothing at wholesale to sell, and she also buys wallets and backpacks.  She travels to the city of Lima to bring back merchandise from a number of different factories, and when she arrives in Cusco she offers the products to different friends that she has, and also to friends of friends.  She has been running this business for 2 years, and it is going very well.  Cristina wants to set up a store where she could sell clothing and accessories with her children, but her current mode of business is working well, and with it she is supporting her children in their college educations.  Cristina wants to invest this loan in the purchase of clothing at wholesale.  She is grateful and appreciates the loan that will be granted, which will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install a wrought-iron front door

loans.name: María Cecilia

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal La Gran Amistad, vive por la parroquia de Cumbe, este lugar es de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente es muy amable y mantienen su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican al comercio, cría de animales, agricultura y muchos salen a trabajar diariamente en la ciudad de Cuenca.
 
Doña María tiene 46 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 8 hijos de los cuales 5 son casados e independientes, sus tres últimos hijos son de 18, 15 y 10 años de edad, su hija de 18 años trabaja para sus gastos personales, su hijo de 15 años estudia el colegio y su ultima hija en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora conduciendo su propia unidad de bus, la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.

La Señora. María hace 15 años se dedica a la venta de carne de cerdo, trabaja en esta actividad diariamente de domingo a domingo desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche. En su casa cría chanchos y gallinas que lo vende en su comunidad.
 
Se encuentra en el banco comunal  15 años y el dinero de su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir para la compra de carne de cerdo y credos para continuar con su negocio.
 
Su meta es de seguir creciendo en el negocio.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the communal bank "La Gran Amistad."  She lives in Cumbe parish, a place with a cold climate and a beautiful view of nature.  The people there are very friendly and maintain their culture and the traditions of their parents; they work in retail trade, livestock and agriculture, and many of them go out each day to work in the city of Cuenca.

Maria is 46 years old, married, and has 8 children.  Five of her children are married and independent, and her 3 youngest children are ages 18, 15, and 10.  Her 18 year-old daughter works to cover her personal expenses.  Her 15 year-old is in school, and her youngest daughter is in a small school in the city.  Her husband works driving his own bus.  The house that they live in is their own property.

Maria has been working selling pork meat for 15 years.  She does this work daily from 8am until 8 at night.  In her house, she raises pigs and hens that she sells in her community.

Maria has been in her communal bank for 15 years, and she will use the money from this new loan to buy pork meat and pigs so that she can continue with her business.

Her goal is to continue to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy pork meat and pigs

loans.name: Gladis

texts.en:
Gladis is 30 years old and lives with her partner. She has one daughter who is two years old. Her occupation is selling various types of sandals. She has her own stand where she sells her sandals in a large  market in the city of Cusco called Mercado Molino. She has had this business for over eight years. 

Gladis is asking for a loan so that she can buy more sandals to sell. In addition, she wants to buy a greater variety of sandals and more recent styles. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more sandals to sell.

loans.name: Jhonatan

texts.es: Jhonatan tiene 30 años es un joven alegre y trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Nancy de 20 años de edad y sus 02 queridos hijos a quienes desean otorgarle una buena educación.Jhonatan, desea salir de la pobreza que aqueja su hogar, es por ello que se esfuerza por trabajar sus plantas de manera tecnificada, él es agricultor y en sus tierras cultiva variedad de plantas como: cacao, café, achiote y palillo, productos que le brindan una buena sostenibilidad económica para mejorar su condición de vida. Viene trabajando 06 años en sus propias tierras y en sus días libres aprovecha para trabajar de jornalero en tierras ajenas, para así obtener mayores ingresos y cubrir los gastos de alimentación y educación de sus menores hijos. Jhonatan, necesita el apoyo de la entidad financiera para mejorar las habitaciones de su vivienda y por ello acude a los créditos que la institución MFP facilita a las personas con múltiples necesidades con miras a progresar e invertir su dinero en beneficios de si mismos. Jhonatan, relata que necesita comprar ladrillos, cementos y fierros para mejorar la fachada de su casa. Para el bien de su porvenir espera trabajar con mayor ímpetu en sus tierras y comprar posteriormente más tierras. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para poder concretar sus planes y se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cronogramas de pago ya que desea acceder a otros créditos posteriormente. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles que solicita, refaccionará  su morada comprando fierros, cementos y ladrillos.
texts.en:
Jhonatan is a happy, hardworking young man of 30 years of age. He lives in his own house with his wife Nancy, age 20, and their two beloved children to whom he would like to provide with a good education. Jhonatan hopes to escape the poverty that his household suffers from, which is why tries to use the most modern farming techniques on his farm. He grows a variety of crops including cacao, coffee, and spices such as annatto and turmeric. These crops yield a profitable return. He has been farming his own land for six years and works as a day laborer on other farms in his spare time, to bring in extra income to cover food and schooling expenses for his youngest children. 

Jhonatan needs financing to improve his home and is applying to MFP, a financial institution that helps low-income clients access credit to invest in improving their lives. He needs a loan for bricks, cement and metal rods to improve the front of his house. In the future, Jhonatan plans to improve his family's quality of life by working hard on his farm and later buying more land. This will be his first loan with MFP. He promises to make his loan payments on time so that he can qualify for more loans in the future. With the 3,000 PEN Jhonatan is requesting, he will refurbish his home.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, and metal rods.

loans.name: Terecita De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora. Terecita es socia del banco comunal La Gran Amistad, vive por la parroquia de Cumbe, este lugar es de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente es muy amable y mantienen su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican al comercio, cría de animales, agricultura y muchos salen a trabajar diariamente en la ciudad de Cuenca.
 
La Señora. Terecita tiene 39 años, es madre soltera de una hija de 7 años de edad que está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive en la casa de sus padres pero independiente. 

Doña Terecita trabaja en la atención de su propio restaurante, esta actividad  la realiza hace 15 años, trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. 

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada  por una amiga y vecina, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de vajilla y víveres para su negocio.
 
Su sueño es no tener deudas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Terecita is a member of the La Gran Amistad communal bank. She lives in the Cumbe parish. This area has a cold climate and has a beautiful view of nature. The residents are kind and maintain their culture and the tradition of their forefathers. They work in trade, raise animals, or farm, and many go to work in the city of Cuenca every day.

Mrs. Terecita is 39. She is a single mother of one daughter aged 7 who is studying in a school in the city. Terecita does not have her own home, so she lives in her parents' home, but independently.

Mrs. Terecita runs her own restaurant. She has done this for 15 years. She works every day of the week from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm.

This is her first loan from the communal bank. She was invited by a friend and neighbour. She will invest her loan in the purchase of dishes and supplies for her business.

Her dream is to have no debts.

loans.use: to purchase dishes and supplies.

loans.name: Frans Jackelyn

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ILLARY III”; este banco comunal pertenece al Distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia Frans;  tiene 23 años de edad  y es soltera la socia es secretaria de ventas, la socia también se dedica  a la venta de ropa, ella trabaja con su mamá y juntas requiere e l préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa al por mayor y vender a las diferentes amistades que ambas tiene e instituciones, la manera de ellas vender es de forma independiente y no tiene stand, la socia desea poder estudiar una carrera más compleja pero por el momento ella trabaja en una institución en el área de ventas, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de ropa al por mayor.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo que se le otorgara para poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Illary III" communal bank. This communal bank belongs to the Huanchac District, in the province and department of Cusco.

Frans is 23, single, and a secretary of sales. She also sells clothing. She works with her mother. Together they need this loan to invest in the wholesale purchase of clothing to sell to the various friends that they both have in businesses. They sell independently and do not have a stand. Frans wants to be able to study for a more complex career but at the moment she works for a company in the area of sales. She wants to invest this loan in the wholesale purchase of clothing.

She is grateful for and values this loan that has been authorized. It will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to invest in the wholesale purchase of clothing.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es: El joven Rogelio es una persona muy responsable con su trabajo que tiene desde hace 4 años, en una empresa que da servicio de paquetería en toda la república y el la recibe en esta ciudad y reparte a su destino. Hace ya mas de 3 años adquirió su vivienda de interés social, la cual necesita construir una barda al frente para que esta mejor protegida; de algún delincuente que quiera robar alguna pertenencia de Rogelio que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha ido comprando. Para poder realizar su proyecto el necesita comprar material para iniciar la construcción y pagarle a la persona  mano de obra, todo para que el tenga mas tranquilidad al irse a su trabajo.
texts.en: Rogelio is a responsible young man who has worked for 4 years in a company that delivers packages all over the country.  He receives the packages in this city and delivers them to their destination.  3 years ago he bought a home in public housing.  The house needs a fence in the front for more security against a delinquent who may want to steal some belongings that Rogelio has worked hard to buy.  For this project he wishes to purchase material to begin the construction and to pay the  labor. This fence would give him peace of mind when he goes to his work.

loans.use: to build a fence

loans.name: Marisol July

texts.en:
Marisol July is 40 years old and lives with her partner. She has two daughters, one of whom lives separately from her and one who lives with her while she completes university. Marisol July is the owner of a small grocery store in which she sells soft drinks, beer, snacks, and household necessities. In addition, she often sells food from her grocery store such as "chicharron"-fried pork commonly served with potatoes and corn. She has had her grocery store for over 14 years. She is asking for a loan in order to buy products for her grocery store such as beer, soft drinks, and snacks. 

Marisol July is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy beer, soft drinks, and snacks for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his car's license plates.

loans.name: Nelly Cecilia

texts.es:
La Señora. Nelly es socia del banco comunal La Gran Amistad, vive por la parroquia de Cumbe, este lugar  es de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente es muy amable y mantienen su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican al comercio, cría de animales, agricultura y muchos salen a trabajar diariamente en la ciudad de Cuenca.
 
Doña Nelly tiene 34 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 13, 12 y 8 años de edad, sus dos primeras hijas estudian en el colegio y su último hijo en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo es de profesión panadero, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

La Señora. Nelly labora en una tienda y panadería que es de su propiedad, lleva en el negocio  9 años y trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 7 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, huevos, levadura, azúcar sal, etc. para su panadería.

Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nelly is a member of the La Gran Amistad communal bank. She lives in the Cumbe parish. This area has a cold climate and a beautiful view of nature. The residents are very kind and maintain the culture and traditions of their forefathers. They work in trade, raise animals, or in agriculture. Many go to the city of Cuenca to work every day.

Mrs. Nelly is 34, married, and she and her husband have 3 children ages 13, 12 and 8. Her two oldest daughters are in high school and the youngest, a son, attends a local elementary school. Her husband is a baker. They do not have their own home as they rent.

Mrs. Nelly works in a store and bakery which is her own property. She has had this business for nine years and works every day of the week from 6:00 am to 10:00 pm.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 7 years and she will invest this new loan in the purchase of flour, butter, eggs, yeast, sugar, salt, etc., for her bakery.

Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: to purchase flour, butter, eggs, yeast, sugar, salt, etc.

loans.name: Giovanni

texts.en:
Giovanni is 37 years old and single. His occupation is selling all types of wood such as firewood and wood planks. First, he buys the wood and then he drives it in a truck a couple hours from his house to sell. Giovanni continues this cycle of buying and selling all year. 

He is asking for a loan so that he can buy the wood and then sell it for profit. He has had this business for about three years and has been very successful. He promises to pay the loan back because he has a set amount of income from his business. In this way, his loan is very risk-free.

loans.use: to buy more wood to sell.

loans.name: Jesús

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Jesús le está haciendo falta un cuarto.
Solicita un préstamo para poder comprar el material que es block, cemento, varilla y arena ya que el se encargara de realizar la mejora en horario adicional a su trabajo. 
Con el ingreso que obtiene de su empleo en una fábrica pagara el crédito, ya que su esposa la señora Diana se encargara de los gastos familiares y escolares de sus tres hijos.
Desea mejorar el patrimonio de su familia y la calidad de vida, ya el cuarto que construirá será para que sus hijos tengan mas espacio en la casa.
texts.en:
Jesus needs to add a room to his house.  He requests a loan so that he can buy materials such as: cement blocks, cement, metal rods and sand, since he is in charge of doing the improvements to the house in his free time.

With the income he earns from his job at a factory he will pay off the loan, since his wife Diana is in charge of the household expenses and education for their three children.  

He wants to improve his family's property and their quality of life.  The room that he will build will be for his sons, so that they can have more space in the home.

loans.use: to add a room onto the back of his house

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ILLARY III”; este banco comunal pertenece al Distrito D. Huanchac, provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.

La socia Georgina;  tiene 52 años D. edad  y es casada la socia tiene 4 hijos D. los cuales todos ellos ya son independientes,  La socia se dedica a la atención D. su horno  pastelería, la socia tiene en casa un horno y a implementado su pastelería, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra D. ingredientes para la elaboración D. pasteles, la socia tiene pensado comprar harina al por mayor ella compraría sacos D. harina, azúcar, huevos, mantequilla a granel al por mayor. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ingredientes para la elaboración D. pasteles y panes para el horno. 

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo que se le otorgara para poder mejorar su calidad D. vida y la D. su familia.
texts.en:
Georgina belongs to the “Illary III” Communal Bank in Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco. 

Georgina is 52 years old, married, and has 4 children, all of whom are independent. She operates a pastry oven in her own home and bakes pastries. Georgina wants to invest the loan in buying ingredients for pastry making. She is planning on buying flour, sugar, eggs, and butter in bulk at wholesale. The loan will be used for purchasing these baking ingredients.

Georgina appreciates and values the loan she hopes to receive, making possible an improved quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: buy ingredients to make pastry and bread in her oven to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a pick-up truck for the business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy island bird guano and animal manure.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José es un hombre muy emprendedor, hace tiempo dejo de trabajar en maquiladora para poner su propio negocio denominado “Miscelánea Florecita” donde ofrece variedad mercancía como lo son: los blanquillos, detergentes, tortillas de maíz y harina, harinas, sal a precio cómodo. José en este momento quiere invertir mas este negocio que es su fuente de ingreso para mantener los gastos del hogar. José y su esposa son quienes atienden el negocio turnándose para tener su propio espacio y la señora n descuide los quehaceres del hogar.
texts.en:
José is a very enterprising man.  Some time ago he stopped working at an assembly plant to open his own business called “Miscelánea Florecita” where he offers a variety of merchandise like: eggs, detergent, corn and flour tortillas, flour and salt at affordable prices.

José at present wants to invest more in this business that’s the source of income to cover household expenses.  

José and his wife are the ones that tend to the store taking turns so that each has their own space and his wife won’t neglect her household chores.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his grocery store.

loans.name: José Luís

texts.es:
El señor José Luís y su esposa la señora Ana Laura tiene dos hijos que están estudian.
Solicitan un préstamo para poder pagar la inscripción y compra de uniformes para la escuela, ya que no cuentan con el dinero necesario para que sus hijos puedan seguir estudian. 
Planea pagar el crédito con una parte del sueldo que recibe como despachador de una gasolinera, es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia.
Don José Luís desea que sus hijos terminen sus estudios para que tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en: José Luís and his wife, Ana Laura, have two children going to school.  They are asking for a loan to be able to pay registration fees and buy school uniforms because they lack the necessary money so that their children can continue studying.  He plans to repay the loan with part of the salary he earns as a gasoline station attendant; this is the family’s source of income.  José Luís wants his children to finish their schooling so that they will have a better future.

loans.use: to pay school registration fees.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es: El señor José Alberto desde hace 12 años labora para un empresa reconocida como promotor del producto ofreciendo de tienda en tienda trasladándose en automóvil que es su herramienta de trabajo. Desde hace 9 años el adquirió su vivienda de interés social ala cual le ha hecho variedad de mejoras, pero en este momento necesita cambiar la pintura del exterior e interior ya que esta muy deteriorada por el sol, para esto el necesita comprar la herramienta necesaria y comprar la pintura para que su casa se vea en mejores condiciones. Es padre de familia que se preocupara por el bienestar y confort de la misma es por ello que trabaja duro para poder sostener los gastos.
texts.en: José Alberto has been working as a sales rep for a well-known firm for the last 12 years. He goes from store to store in a car that’s his work tool.  Nine years ago he bought a government subsidized house that he’s done a variety of improvements to but currently he needs to repaint the interior and the exterior because it’s quite sun damaged.  Because of this he needs to buy the necessary tools and to buy paint so that his house will be in better condition.  He’s a father concerned for his family’s comfort and wellbeing and this is why he works hard to cover expenses.

loans.use: to paint the interior and the exterior of his house.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Antonio es viudo, hace 7 años que enviudo, tiene 2 hijos que son mayores de edad y no viven con él. Antonio se dedica al servicio de transporte urbano en su moto taxi, ya tiene 02 años realizando el servicio; eligió este tipo de trabajo porque para la edad que tiene le parece un trabajo de poco esfuerzo físico.
