She asks for this loan to plant corn and buy compost and inputs for the crops. The loan will help to supply the necessary money and improve her agricultural activities. She faces challenges like crop diseases such as "cinta roja" (red stripe). Her dream is to buy herself a farm.

She likes to do housework.

loans.use: to plant corn and buy compost and inputs for the crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corn and utensils to continue making "chicha de jora" drink.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge Luis, tiene 25 años de edad, es casado, vive con su esposa y su hija de 2 años en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C JESUS NOS AMA, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Los Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol Gandul.

Jorge  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol Gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial Camacho y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.
 
Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de abonos e insumos  para los cultivos.   El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos como cinta roja en el maíz. Su sueño es comprarse una finca. 

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis, 25, is married and lives with his wife and 2-year-old daughter in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank JESUS NOS AMA is located in the community of Los Amarillos which belongs to the Ventanas Canton.  This group is involved in growing short-cycle crops such as corn, rice and Gandul beans.

Jorge also grows corn, rice and Gandul beans.  He buys his supplies in Comercial Camacho and sells his produce at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizer for his corn crop.  The loan will help cover his economic needs and improve his farm activities.  He is up against challenges such as crop plagues (red ribbon in corn). His dream is to buy a farm one day.

He enjoys sports.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer for his corn crop.

loans.name: Maria Virgilia

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la elaboración D. artesanía D. jarcia, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, inicio este negocio al recibir capacitaciones, aprendió a hacer las artesanías D. jarcia, ella se ha dedicado a enseñarle a su familia.
Actualmente ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. un pedido en granD. D. mercadería entre ellas hamacas, lazos, matatas, su inconveniente es no tener el efectivo, por esta razón solicita el préstamo para cubrir el gasto.
Su objetivo es que el negocio crezca para ayudar a sus hijos y proveer para ellos todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Maria has a business making handicrafts out of string.  She lives with her husband and 3 children.  She started this business after receiving training where she learned to make crafts out of string, and she is teaching this skill to her family.  

Now she is requesting a loan to pay for a big order of merchandise such as hammocks, ties and string tote bags.  The problem is she doesn't have the cash, so for this reason she is requesting a loan to cover the bill.

Her goal is to grow her business so that she can help her children and proviD. them with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy hammocks, ties and string tote bags for her business

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge Luis, tiene 32 años D. edad, es casado, vive con su esposa y sus hijos D. 14 y 10 años en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia D. los Ríos. 

Los miembros D. la V.R.C JESUS NOS AMA, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Los Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas D. ciclo corto como siembra D. maíz, arroz y fréjol Gandul.

Jorge  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra D. maíz, arroz y fréjol Gandul. Compra sus productos en Agroquímicos El Copa y los venD. en el mercado mayorista D. Ventanas.
 
Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra D. abonos e insumos  para los cultivos.   El  crédito le servirá D. apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos como cinta roja en el maíz. Su sueño es comprarse una finca. 

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis, 32, is married and lives with his wife and children, ages 14 and 10, in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank JESUS NOS AMA is located in the community of Los Amarillos which belongs to the Ventanas Canton. This group is involved in growing short-cycle crops such as corn, rice and Gandul beans.

Jorge also grows corn, rice and Gandul beans. He buys his supplies in Agroquímicos El Copa and sells his produce at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizer for his corn crop. The loan will help cover his economic needs and improve his farm activities. He is up against challenges such as crop plagues (red ribbon in corn). His dream is to buy a farm one day.

He enjoys sports.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer for his corn crop.

loans.name: Gino

texts.es: Gino tiene 23 años, es padre de un niño de 1 año de edad, vive en casa de su madre junto a su esposa y sus padres. Gino se dedica a la edición de audio y video, cuyo contenido son programas de la región, su trabajo consiste en realizar comerciales, sesiones fotográficas, narrar algunos documentales, etc. Este trabajo lo realiza en la casa de su mamá, ahí le dieron un espacio para que lo convierta en su oficina. Él lleva ya casi 2 años en este trabajo, siente que le va bien ya que su clientela ha crecido bastante. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo, es que a parte de trabajar el se divierte haciendo esto ya que es algo que le nació desde muy niño, lo que no le gusta es que a veces tiene que ir a trabajar a altas horas de la noche y tiene que dejar a su esposa e hijo. Tiene en mente poder expandir su negocio comprando parlantes, luces y otros instrumentos que son necesarios para su trabajo. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP y espera poder seguir trabajando juntos ya que siente que le dan muchos beneficios. Con el crédito solicitado, comprará micrófonos, parlantes y algunos otros instrumentos necesarios para su trabajo.
texts.en: Gino is 23 years old.  He is the father of a 1-year-old son, and he lives in his mother's house with his wife and his parents.  Gino edits audio and video, the content of which is regional programming.  His work consists of making commercials, doing photographic sessions, narrating documentaries, etc.  He does this work at his mother's house; there they gave him a space for him to convert into his office.  He has been doing this work for almost two years, and he feels it's going well, since his clientele has grown quite a lot.  What he likes about his job is that in addition to working, he is enjoying himself, since this is something that has come naturally to him since he was very young.  What he doesn't like is that sometimes he has to go to work late at night, and he has to leave his wife and child.  He would like to be able to expand his business by buying speakers, lights, and other instruments that are necessary for his work.  This is his second loan with MFP, and he hopes to be able to continue working with them, since he feels they provide him with many benefits. With the loan he is asking for, he will buy microphones, speakers, and some other instruments necessary for his work.

loans.use: to purchase microphones and speakers.

loans.name: Edgar Jeovanny

texts.es:
Edgar Jeovanny, tiene 29 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su mamá en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C JESUS NOS AMA, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Los Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol Gandul.

Edgar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol Gandul. Compra sus productos en Agroquímicos El Copa y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.
 
Solicita el crédito para sembrar arroz y maíz, compra de abonos e insumos  para los cultivos.   El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos como cinta roja en el maíz. Su sueño es comprarse una finca. 

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Edgar Jeovanny, 29, is single and lives with his mother in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank JESUS NOS AMA is located in the community of Los Amarillos which belongs to the Ventanas Canton. This group is involved in growing short-cycle crops such as corn, rice and Gandul beans.

Edgar also grows corn, rice and Gandul beans. He buys his supplies in Agroquímicos El Copa and sells his produce at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizer for his rice and corn crops. The loan will help cover his economic needs and improve his farm activities. He is up against challenges such as crop plagues (red ribbon in corn). His dream is to buy a farm one day.

He enjoys sports.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer for his rice and corn crops.

loans.name: Jiovanni

texts.es: Jiovanni es una mujer de 37 años, pujante y trabajadora vive en casa de su madre junto a su esposo y 10 personas más, entre ellos hermanos y sobrinos. El trabajo que ella realiza consiste en la compra y venta de madera, en el proceso ellos realizan el corte y empaquetado para poder enviarlos a la ciudad de Lima a un comprador que tienen como cliente. Esta actividad lo realiza en los diferentes aserraderos de la ciudad junto a su esposo quien es conocido en el negocio ya que trabaja en un aserradero.  Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder invertir y recuperar rápido su dinero, lleva ya 2 años en este negocio y lo que no le agrada es que tiene que quemarse del sol pero vale la pena por que al final se ve los resultados con las ganancias, espera poder seguir trabajando con la institución ya que se siente cómoda. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP y espera poder seguir yendo como hasta ahora, siendo responsable y sobre todo cumplida con el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1700 soles solicitados, comprará madera.
texts.en:
Jiovanni, 37, is vigorous and hard-working, and she lives in her mother’s house along with her husband and 10 others, including brothers and sisters, nieces and nephews.  She buys and sells wood and also cuts and packs the wood to be able to send it to Lima to a buyer that they have as a customer.
She patronizes different sawmills in the city with her husband, who knows the business because he himself used to work in a sawmill. What she likes most about the work is the ability to invest and recover her money quickly.  She has been in this business for 2 years but what she doesn’t like is that she gets very sunburned.  However, she says it’s worth it since at the end, she sees her earnings and she hopes to continue working with the institution now that she feels comfortable.  This is her fifth loan with MFP and she wishes to continue borrowing as she does now, being responsible and especially reliable with her payments.  She will use the 1700 sols to buy wood.

loans.use: to buy more wood.

loans.name: Clara Inés

texts.es:
Clara Inés de 47 años de edad vive en Sabanagrande,  un municipio localizado en la región centro oriental del Departamento del Atlántico, a 20 kilómetros de su Distrito Capital Barranquilla; allí vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de  20 y 22  años;  Clara inició su negocio de venta de jugos y empanadas,  hace 17 años cuando su esposo quedó sin trabajo y aprovechó las fiestas patronales para hacer su mejor debut; en su primer intento generó los ingresos que requería para el sostenimiento de sus familia  y así continuó agregando a su clientela informal, la de la alcaldía y otros negocios muy cercanos al sitio donde se ubica en la actualidad. 
Este es el tercer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará materias primas e insumos en mayor volumen y poder preparar suficientes productos para atender su demanda. Con sus anteriores financiamiento logró invertirlos y posteriormente comprar un lote donde ha levantado su casa, con el fruto de su trabajo. Su meta más adelante es terminar su vivienda, adecuando un espacio para una refresquería bien dotada. Mientras esto ocurre Clara Inés continua trabajando en su negocio rotando sus cuentas por cobrar cada 13 dias y una rentabilidad sobre las ventas del 22%.
texts.en:
Clara Inés, 47, lives in Sabanagrande, a town in the central eastern part of the department of Atlántico, 20 kilometers from the capital city Barranquilla.  She lives with her husband and two children, ages 20 and 22.  Clara began selling juices and empanadas (meat pies) 17 years ago when her husband was layed off.  She took advantage of the patron saint festivities to make her debut.  On her first try she generated enough income to maintain the family and so continued adding more and more customers, including the town hall and other nearby businesses.

This is her third loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation.  She plans to use it to buy larger volumes of ingredients and supplies so she can meet demand.  With her previous loans she was able to invest in her business and afford to buy property where she has built her house.  Her goal is to finish her house and set up a well-equipped refreshment area.  Meanwhile Clara Inés will continue working with an accounts receivable turnover of 13 days and profit on sales of 22%.

loans.use: To buy larger volumes of ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 64 años, es separada, vive en casa propia junto a su hijo y sus dos nietos
a quienes desea ver crecer con una buena educación y salud, es por eso que ella trabaja duro para poder ayudarlos. Elizabeth trabaja como costurera, además utiliza su tiempo libre para ir a los caseríos y lugares alejados de la ciudad a vender ropa de segunda. Ella tuvo que trabajar desde muy chica ya que la costura lo realiza desde que tenía 14 años y lleva la cuenta de la venta de ropa de segunda desde hace 4 años, ella trabaja sola, pues su hijo le ayuda trabajando en su mototaxi por las calles de la ciudad. Le gusta su trabajo porque dispone de su tiempo y ella sabe cuando puede realizar otras actividades y además que genera ganancias ya que tiene clientes que siempre ella visita y le realizan buenas compras. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP y le gusta estar en este grupo por que lo bueno es que todos asumen su responsabilidad de no dejar mal al grupo. Con los 1200 soles solicitados, comprará telas para empezara a confeccionar fundas para televisores, además le enviaran ropa de segunda de la ciudad de Lima para que pueda seguir con el negocio acá.
texts.en: Elizabeth is 64 years old and is separated. She lives in her own house with her son and her two grandchildren who she wants to see grow up with a good education and good health. This is the reason she works hard in order to help them. Elizabeth works as a seamstress. She also uses her free time to go to villages and other faraway places to sell second hand clothing. She has had to work from a very young age. She started sewing when she was 14 years old. She has sold the used clothes for four years. She works alone and he son helps her by driving his mototaxi on the city’s streets. She likes her work because she organizes her time and she knows when she can do other activities. Also she likes it because it generates income now that she has customers that she always visits and they make good purchases. This is her fourth loan with MFP and she likes being in this group because everyone takes responsibility to make sure the group is successful. With the 1,200 soles requested, she will buy fabric to make covers for television sets. In addition, she will send second hand clothing to Lima in order to continue with her business there.

loans.use: stock up on second hand clothing and purchase fabric.

loans.name: Hildebrando

texts.es:
Hildebrando tiene 40 años de edad, conviviente, con 01 hijo. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en un Caserío del distrito de Tambogrande, la zona donde vive Hildebrando es rural y no cuanta con servicio básicos.

Hildebrando se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino los cuales cría en corrales cercanos a su domicilio, ademas se dedica a la agricultura contando con 1 hectárea de terreno agrícola donde tiene sembrado limón en producción que cosecha semanalmente.

Hildebrando esta solicitando un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles, dinero que necesita  para la compra de alimentos balanceados , asi como pastos naturales para sus ovinos y aves , ya que de esta manera lograran un mejor peso y tamaño, ademas comprará fertilizantes para el cultivo de limón, realizará labores de deshierbo y poda.

Hildebrando es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su negocio crezca cada vez más y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Hildebrando is 40 years old and has a partner and one son.  He lives in his own house, which is located in a village in the Tambogrande district.  The area in which Hildebrando lives is rural and does not have basic services.

Hildebrando raises sheep in pens near his home.  He also is a farmer with 1 hectare of agricultural land, where he grows lemons, which he harvests weekly.

Hildebrando is seeking a loan of $375 (1000 new soles) from microfinance partner Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed, as well as natural fodder for his sheep and poultry, so that they can grow in weight and size.  He will also buy fertilizer for his lemon bushes and will prune and weed them. 


Hildebrando is a hard-working and trustworthy person who wants his business to keep growing and growing so his children can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his animals and fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Jaime Arturo

texts.es:
Jaime, reside en San Miguel, vive con su familia, tiene tres hijos de 17, 20 y 23 años de edad, él posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, es negocio familiar y lo ejerce desde hace muchos años, lo aprendió de su padre y hoy día es el que permite tener una fuente de ingreso.
El necesita comprar materiales para realizar unos trabajos, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar hierro y pintura, esta inversión le ayudara a solventar la falta de materiales y poder realizar los trabajos de los clientes.
Su aspiración es tener un negocio grande, tener una mejor estabilidad y ayudar a sus hijos a superarse, además de terminar la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Jaime lives in San Miguel with his family; he has three children who are 17, 20 and 23 years of age.  He has a metal shop.  It’s a family business and he’s been in it for many years.  He learned from his father and today it’s what allows him to have a source of income.

He needs to buy materials to do some jobs so is asking for a loan to buy iron and paint.  This investment will help him solve his lack of materials problem and be able to complete jobs for customers.

His wish is to have a large business, better stability and to help his children improve themselves as well as to finish building his house.

loans.use: to buy iron and paint for the shop.

loans.name: Basti

texts.es: Basti tiene 28 años, viven en su casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 9 y 1 año, sus dos sobrinos y su esposo con quien trabaja mucho para poder dar una buena educacio0n a sus hijos y sobrinos, ya que ella considera muy importante para el futuro de ellos. Basti se dedica a la venta de productos por catalogo y cuando hay oportunidad de poder entrar en un nuevo negocio dice si al reto e incursiona en el que ella cree conveniente y le generará ganancias. Entre las demás actividades que realiza esta el de vender zapatos y ropa, los productos que vende los ofrece entre sus conocidos y familiares, y eso le genera muy buena ganancia ya que se necesita de poca inversión y comisiona un buen porcentaje. Pero la ganancia de Basti esta mas en comprar productos en oferta y luego venderlos en precio normal generándole un porcentaje muy alto. Ahora ella junto a su esposa están incursionando en los venta de alimentos y esta próxima a aperturar una polleria el cual espera le vaya bien como le ha ido hasta ahora en sus demás actividades. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP y se siente cómoda trabajando con la institución ya que en el grupo en el que está es un grupo unido y todos se llevan bien. Con los 1000 soles que solicita, comprará zapatos y productos de catalogo, entre ellos artículos para el hogar, que están de oferta para que pueda tener en stock.
texts.en:
Basti, 28, lives in her own house with her two children who are 9 and 1 years old, her two nephews and her husband with whom she works hard to provide good education for her children and nephews because she considers that very important for their future.

Basti sells merchandise via catalogue and when the opportunity to go into a new area presents itself she says yes to the challenge and goes into whatever she considers convenient that will generate profits.  Among the many activities she carries out is the sale of shoes and clothes.  She sells these products among her acquaintances and family members and this generates good profits since the investment needed is small and commissions are a good percentage.  However, Basti’s profits depend more on her being able to buy products that are on special and then reselling them at regular prices thus generating a very high percentage profit.   She and her husband are now going to go into food sales and are about to open a chicken shop where she hopes she will do as well as she’s done in her other activities.

This is the 6th MFP loan and she feels comfortable working with the institution because the group she’s in is a very united group and they all get along very well with each other.  She will use the requested 1000 soles to buy shoes and catalog items, among them items for the home, that are on sale to have in stock.

loans.use: to buy shoes and articles for the home.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia 28 años de edad, ella es casada y cuenta con casa propia,  La cual está ubicada en una zona rural del distrito de Castilla, en el departamento Piura al norte del Perú.

Lidia se dedica a la venta de ropa para todas las edades,el negocio lo a colocado en su domicilio desde hace unos años, pero también deja mercadería en otros caseríos y cobra cada fin de mes, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar los gastos familiares.

Al observar Lidia que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar prendas de vestir novedosas y en mayor cantidad para abastecer su tienda con productos de   innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

Lidia es una persona responsable  y que con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo,está saliendo adelante, cuenta con muy buenas referncias y con la estima de las personas que la conocen.
texts.en:
Lidia is 28 and married.  She lives in her own house, which is located in a rural area of the Castilla district in the department of Piura in the north of Peru.

Lidia sells clothes for all ages.  She has been conducting this business from her home for several years, but she also leaves merchandise in other villages and charges for it at the end of the month in order to stimulate more demand from her clients and thereby gain more income to help with the household expenses.

Lidia says that her business is more and more prosperous every day, and she is seeking a loan of $375 (1000 new soles) from microfinance partner Edpyme Alternativa to buy a new and greater stock of clothing.  She will use this stock to fill her shop with innovative products so that her clientele keeps growing, thus allowing her to pay off the loan and raise her family's quality of life.

Lidia is a trustworthy person  and, with much effort and work, she is getting ahead. She comes well-recommended and with the esteem of those who know her.

loans.use: to buy a new stock of clothing for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beauty supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy spare parts.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es: Dora tiene 45 años, es una mujer pujante y valiente, ella es madre de 3 hijos de los cuales solo  vive con una de ellos y su esposo en su casa que es propia. Dora depende mucho del tiempo y la temporada de lluvia para tener un trabajo arduo o simple, pues cuando el río sube su nivel, ella tiene que salir al río junto a su esposo en busca de pescado. Posee 4 redes, de las cuales los utilizan al máximo; pero cuando es temporada baja solo sale su esposo y ella queda en su casa haciendo algunas otras actividades. Lleva ya dos años trabajando en esta actividad y tiene clientes fijos quienes esperan su llegada para comprarle su producto alimenticio. Le agrada trabajar en este negocio por que lo hizo desde muy niña y aun que se dedico a otras actividades antes, se dio cuenta que esta le genera mas ganancias, además de poder trabajar junto a su esposo y en algunas oportunidades también junto a sus hijos, Lo que no le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene que salir al río y es un trabajo un poco peligroso, pero como dice ella, “que se le va hacer si de eso vive”. Tiene también 2 botes de pesca y esta en proyecto comprarse una red y un bote más. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP se siente bien con este grupo por que los problemas lo solucionan entre ellas. Con el monto solicitado, piensa comprar una red, además de dar el pago inicial para comprarse un bote.
texts.en:
Dora, 45, is a very vigorous, brave woman.  She’s the mother of three children but only one of them still lives with her and her husband in her house.  

Dora is quite dependent on the weather, especially the rainy season, to have a simple, but hard, job.  When the river’s level rises she has to go out with her husband to seek out fish.  She owns four nets that are used to the maximum extent but when the season is low, just her husband goes out and she stays home doing some other activities.  

She’s been in this line of work for two years and has regular customers who wait for her to return to buy the food fish from her.  She enjoys working in this occupation because she’s done it since childhood and even though she did other things previously she realized that this is more profitable plus she’s able to work alongside her husband and sometimes even with her children.  What she dislikes about the job is having to go out into the river because this can be somewhat dangerous but like she says: “what can one do if that’s one’s livelihood.”  She also has two fishing boats and is planning to buy another net and another boat.

This is the 2nd MFP loan.  She feels happy with this group because they solve their problems among themselves.  She will use the amount requested to buy a net and to pay the down payment on a boat.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net and to pay the initial payment on a fishing boat.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosa Aminta

texts.es:
Rosa, se dedica a la venta de queso, ella vive con sus hijos, ella tiene el negocio de la venta de queso en su vivienda este es hereditario, también vende tortillas, de estos dos negocios ha logrado mantener a su familia y hoy en día necesita financiamiento para comprar maíz y leña para la elaboración de tortillas.
Este préstamo le ayudara para contar con los materiales necesarios para darle continuidad al negocio, manteniendo siempre las ventas a los clientes frecuentes.
Su objetivo es mejorar cada día, teniendo esta fuente de ingreso para solventar las necesidades más prioritarias de su hogar.
texts.en: Rosa sells cheese.  She lives with her children.  She has a home-based cheese selling business that was passed down from her parents.  She also sells tortillas.  These two businesses make it possible for her to support her family and presently she needs a loan to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas. This loan will help her have the necessary raw materials on hand to give her business continuity keeping sales up with her regular customers. Her objective is to improve each day having this source of income to meet the most pressing needs in her home.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.en:
Jaime is 48 years old and married. He has four children. 

He has a business selling car parts, such as tires, mirrors and gas pipes. He is very proud of his business and works every day selling car parts. 

He is asking for a loan in order to buy more car parts to sell in his shop. Specifically he plans to buy tires and a wide variety of other car parts to sell. 

He is eager to improve his business and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more car parts such as tires and mirrors to sell.

loans.name: Alexander Antonio

texts.es: Alexander Antonio de 34 años de edad, habita en casa propia con su esposa  Sandra de 28 años y sus cuatro hijos,  tres de los cuales se encuentran estudiando, en una zona muy sencilla del país. Alexander es un hombre creativo, no pierde oportunidad para hacer cosas nuevas y atractivas. Él se dedica a la fabricación y venta ambulante de calzado para todas las edades, gustos y preferencias. Gracias a su carisma ha logrado establecer buena clientela ya que es un hombre amable y también porque cuando de zapatos se trata el siempre tiene lo que los clientes necesitan, además ofrece calidad y buenos precios en su zapatería. Gracias a este negocio ha logrado sacar adelante a su  familia y su sueño es seguir recibiendo los frutos del mismo que hasta el momento han sido muy favorables. Todo esto lo ha llevado a tomar la decisión de solicitar nuevo crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de la materia prima necesaria como: cuero, pega, agujas, nylon, etc. para seguir elaborando variedad de zapatos que le permitan a traer a mas clientes, Alexander esta muy bien referenciado como cliente de esta institución. De esta manera espera seguir dando a su familia el pan de cada día y poder dar a sus hijas el estudio para que algún día se puedan convertir en grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Alexander Antonio, 34, lives in his own house with his wife, Sandra, 28, and their four children, three of whom are in school, in a very simple part of the country.  

Alexander is a very creative man.  He does not let an opportunity to make new and attractive things pass him by.  He manufactures and is a street vendor of all sorts of footwear for all ages, tastes and preferences.  Thanks to his charisma he’s managed to establish a regular customer base because he’s a kind man and also because if it’s something to do with shoes, he always has what customers need.  Besides, he offers quality and affordable prices in his shoe shop.  Thanks to this business he’s been able to support his family and his dream is to continue enjoying the fruits of his labor which have been profitable to date.

All this has led him to call upon INTEGRAL to request a new loan to buy raw materials like: leather, glue, needles, nylon, etc. to continue making a variety of shoes that will attract more customers.

Alexander has very good references as a client of this institution.  He hopes this way to continue to provide his family with their daily bread and give his daughters schooling so that someday they can become great professionals.

loans.use: to buy necessary raw materials like leather, glue, needles, nylon, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as potatoes and bread in larger quantities.

loans.name: Janeth

texts.es: Janeth tiene 24 años es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida y una excelente educación. El trabajo de Janet es la compra y venta de ropa, esta actividad lo realiza en su casa y en diferentes puntos de su localidad, pues ofrece su mercadería a amigos, familiares. Es así que desde muy temprano va en busca de nuevos clientes, sobre todo que sean amigos o conocidos de sus amistades, de esa manera garantiza que le paguen la mercadería que ofrece. Tiene 5 años trabajando y considera que gracias a esta actividad siempre esta en constante movimiento, sin embargo tiene que dejar solo a sus hijos y son todavía muy pequeños. Espera poder seguir trabajando con la institución ya que ha logrado bastantes cosas en este poco tiempo. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para que pueda continuar trabajando. Con el crédito solicitado, comprará ropa para su siguiente venta, pues tiene muchos pedidos que cumplir.
texts.en:
Janeth is 24 years old.  She is a very kind and hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her husband and three children who she would like to provide with a better quality of life and an excellent education.

Janeth buys and sells clothes.  She carries out this business from her home and also in different places in her town.  She sells her merchandise to friends and family members.  She goes out very early in the morning in search of new customers, above all friends or friends of friends as this guarantees that her customers pay her for the merchandise that she sells.  Janeth has been working in this business for five years and she considers herself to be in constant motion thanks to her business.  However, she has to leave her children alone and they are still very young.  She hopes to be able to continue working with our institution since she has achieved quite a lot in a short space of time.

This is Janeth's second loan from MFP and she hopes to receive the support of each and every one of you so that she can continue working.  She will use the loan she has requested to buy clothes to sell as she has a lot of orders to fill.

loans.use: to buy more clothes

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Brenda Jeacqueline

texts.es:
Brenda, se dedica a la venta D. ropa nueva, mochilas escolares y vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 22, 20 y 18 años D. edad, solamente uno D. sus hijos depenD. D. ella, Brenda inicio el negocio por una amiga quien le enseño a vender, sale D. su vivienda a las 5:00am y regresa a las 3:00pm, este es su horario más normal.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para surtir el negocio, en compra D. ropa como blusas, faldas y mochilas escolares, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar el inventario en su negocio, para ofrecer mayor variedad a los clientes.
Su aspiración es tener un negocio propio, terminar D. pagar las deudas y solventar las necesidades D. su familia.
texts.en:
Brenda sells new clothes and school backpacks.  She lives with her husband and three children who are 22, 20 and 18 years of age.  Only one of her children still depends on her.  Brenda started the business thanks to a girl friend who taught her how to sell.  She leaves home at 5am and returns at 3pm; this is her most normal schedule.

At present, she needs a loan to stock her business buying clothes like blouses and skirts and school backpacks.  This purchase will help her improve inventory in her business to offer greater variety to customers.

Her goal is to have a business of her own, to finish paying off her debts and to meet her family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: José Luis Raúl

texts.es: José Luis de 27 años de edad, reside en casa familiar con su esposa y su pequeña hija de 3 años. José se dedica a la fabricación y venta de pan dulce y francés. Hace ya varios años que logro establecer el negocio de panadería y hasta el momento es su principal fuente de ingresos. Gracias a su carisma ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas  por lo que cuenta con muchos clientes fijos que lo prefieren por ofrecer calidad, buen precio y deliciosos panes. Últimamente ha notado un aumento en la demanda de sus ricos panes y como es un hombre emprendedor no quiere dejar ir esta oportunidad. Ha decidido aumentar la oferta de sus productos pero para esto necesita invertir un poco más en la materia prima necesaria para la elaboración del pan. Esto lo ha impulsado a solicitar este crédito para comprar los principales insumos como: harinas, huevos, manteca, canela, azúcar, etc. De esta manera espera ver florecer su negocio asi como mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is 27 years old and resides in his family home with his wife and small daughter, aged 3 years. Jose Luis is dedicated to making and selling sweet buns and French bread.

Some years ago he established his bakery business and at present, it is still his principal source of income. Thanks to his charisma, Jose Luis has been able to gain the confidence of many people and, as a result, he has many fixed customers who prefer his products for their quality, good price, and delicious flavor.

Lately, he has noted an increase in demand for his rich breads and since he is an enterprising man, he doesn't want to let this opportunity go by. Jose Luis has decided to increase his offered products but for this, he needs to invest a little more in the primary ingredients used in making bread. This has motivated him to solicit a loan to buy the principal ingredients, such as flour, eggs, lard, cinnamon,  sugar, etc.

In this manner, Jose Luis hope to see his business flourish and the quality of life improve for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy the principal ingredients, such as flour, eggs, lard, cinnamon, sugar, etc., for baking bread.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia is 46 years old and married. She has five children. 

She is in the construction business, specializing in roof tile fabrication. In addition, she also has a business selling dry grains such as wheat, brown rice, and corn. 

She is asking for a loan in order to buy more tiles and other materials for construction and also to purchase more wheat, brown rice and corn to sell at her store. 

Anastacia works every day at both businesses and is very hardworking. She is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy tiles and other materials for construction.

loans.name: Jesús Ernesto

texts.es: Jesús Ernesto de 24 años de edad, reside en casa propia con su compañera de vida de 29 años y su pequeña hija de 6 años en zona semiurbana del país. Jesús tiene un pequeño taller de carpintería y de pintura de muebles. Desde hace varios años que se dedica a este negocio y gracias a su esfuerzo y con la ayudad de Dios lo ha sabido mantener  activo y hasta el momento es su principal fuente de ingresos. Para él lo más importante es su querida familia y esta es la razón de su dedicación en su trabajo, ya que el sueña con darles una vida diferente y algún día poder ver a su hija como toda una profesional. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su pequeño negocio y poder comprar la materia prima necesaria como: madera, lijas, herramientas, pintura, etc. con el objetivo de abastecer su negocio para poder atraer a más clientes que le generen un aumento en sus ventas y en su ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jesús Ernesto is 24 years old.  He lives in his own house with his 29-year-old life partner and their 6-year-old daughter in a semiruban area of the country.  Jesús has a small carpentry and furniture painting shop.  He’s been in this line of work for several years now and thanks to his efforts and help from God he’s kept it active and to date is his main source of income.  For him, the most important thing is his dear family and this is the reason for his dedication to work because he dreams with giving them a different life and someday seeing his daughter become every bit the professional.

He has decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in his small business and be able to buy the necessary raw materials like: lumber, sandpaper, tools, paint, etc. with the goal of stocking his business to attract more customers that will lead to an increase in sales and income that will permit him to improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy necessary raw materials like: lumber, sand paper, tools, paint, etc.

loans.name: Edgar Gerardo

texts.es:
Edgar es un señor de 49 años el cual vive con su familia en una comunidad rural de Costa Rica llamada Mollejones de Platanares, Pérez Zeledón. Mollejones es una comunidad ubicada a 150 kilómetros al sur de la Provincia de San José, la capital de Costa Rica. Se encuentra a 850 metros sobre el nivel del mar. Ahí se cultivan hortalizas, café y además se desarrollan otras actividades como la crianza de ganado de engorde y de cerdos. Existen también algunos proyectos de agricultura orgánica y hortalizas en hidroponía. Además de la agricultura en la comunidad hay talleres mecánicos, un supermercado, pequeños restaurantes (sodas) y una mueblería.

Desde hace algún tiempo Edgar se dedica a la siembra de café. Dice que desde que inició el proyecto los resultados han sido buenos, ya que ha tenido una gran aceptación en su comunidad y los ingresos que ha generado lo han ayudado a sacar adelante a su familia.

En estos momentos lo que desea Don Edgar es solicitar un préstamo por ¢500,000 (seiscientos mil colones) para comprar de más almacigo, fertilizante y mano de obra  que necesita para su finca de café. Con esto espera que su microempresa crezca y llegue a generar más ingresos para mejorar su condición de vida.  
Don Edgar forma parte de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Bancruce una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Como socio ha recibido un microcrédito que le han permitido crecer como microempresarios.
texts.en:
Edgar is a 49 year-old man who lives with his family in a rural community of Costa Rica called Mollejones de Platanares, Pérez Zeledón.  Mollejones is a community which is located 150 kilometers to the south of San José province, the capital of Costa Rica.  It is 850 meters above sea level.  People there grow vegetables and coffee.  They also work in other business activities such as raising and fattening cattle and pigs.  There are some organic farming projects and vegetables grown by hydroponics.  In addition to farming, there are auto repair shops, a supermarket, small restaurants (soda bars) and a furniture store in the community.

Edgar has been growing coffee for some time.  He says that since he started this project his results have been good as he has had good acceptance in his community and the income he has made has helped him to get his family ahead in life.

Right now, what Edgar wants is to request a loan for 500,000 to buy more seedbeds and fertilizers, and to pay laborers who he needs to work on his coffee plantation.  With this help, he hopes that his micro-business will grow and that he will manage to make more income in order to improve his living conditions.

Edgar is a member of the Bancruce Community Loan Company, one of EDESA's 100 member organizations in Costa Rica.  As a member, he has received a micro-loan which has enabled him to grow as a micro-businessman.

loans.use: to buy a seedbed and fertilizer, and to pay laborers

loans.name: Rosemberg

texts.es:
Rosemberg, tiene un taller de bicicletas, donde las repara y vende, él vive con su grupo familiar, su esposa y tres hijos de 10, 8 y 6 años de edad, aprendió a reparar bicicletas por su  padre, tiene 10 años de administrar el taller y lo atiende de 7:30 a 6:00pm.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de accesorios para el negocio, frenos, pedales, cadenas, asientos, estos pues le servirán para mantener un buen numero en el inventario.
Su objetivo es generar mayores ventas a los clientes proporcionándoles todo lo necesario, también quiere en un futuro y a través de sus ganancias comprar un lote o casa para vivir en lo propio con su familia.
texts.en:
Rosemberg has a bicycle shop where he repairs and sells bicycles. He lives with his family, wife and three children of 10, 8 and 6 years of age. Rosemberg learned to repair bicycles from his father, and for 10 years he has managed his shop which is open from 7:30 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

He needs the loan to buy accessories for the business: breaks, pedals, chains, and seats, that will help him have a good number of them in his inventory.

Rosemberg’s goal is to have greater sales and provide his customers what they need by giving them everything necessary. In the future, with his profits he wants to buy a lot or a home to live on his own with his family.

loans.use: buy spare parts for bicycles: breaks, pedals, chains and seats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a greater variety of products like: rice, beans, candy, sweet bread, detergent, oil, etc.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is 45 years old and married. She has three children. 

She has a business selling beauty products and cosmetics such as creams, perfumes, make-up and hair products. She sells her products to various clients all around the city of Cusco. 

In addition, she also has a small furniture-making business. 

Gladys is asking for a loan in order to buy more beauty products to sell such as shampoos, hair clips, lotions and make-up. She will also use part of the loan to buy wood and other materials to make furniture. 

Gladys is a very hardworking woman and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products to sell such as make-up, perfumes and hair products.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan tiene  19 años, nació en el caserío de Yanama Alto, ahí creció al cuidado de su mamá Agripina, su papá Cupertino y sus 3 hermanos con los que vive en su casa propia. La vitalidad y las ganas de triunfar le llevaron a tener visiones muy claras de lo que quiere en la vida. Cada 2 meses viaja al país de Argentina, donde se dedica al negocio de elaboración de zapatillas de todos los modelos y clases. Ahí tiene buenas ganancias, durante 6 días se dedica al corte del producto terminado, dejándolo listo para ser comercializado. Pero sus aspiraciones es poseer sus propias máquinas para comenzar su propio negocio, para eso le falta 15 mil soles de capital, los cuales espera obtener de la agricultura. Oficio que le enseñaron sus padres, ya tiene 2 años de experiencia en la siembra de papa, habas, arveja y ajos. Los cuales cuida y fertiliza en los meses de temporada agrícola, donde espera con calma la cosecha para venderla al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, donde obtiene buenas ganancias que le permiten juntar dinero para su objetivo y apoyar en los gastos familiares. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde agradece la oportunidad de progreso que le ofrecieron. Además de comprometerse a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Juan de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja para comenzar está campaña agrícola.
texts.en: Juan is 19 years old, he was born in Yanama Alto, he grew up under his mother’s, Agripina, and father's, Cupertino's care. He lives with his 3 siblings and parents whom he lives with in his own home. His vitality and determination to get ahead have helped him have a clear vision of what he wants in life. Every 2 months he travels to Argentina where he makes shoes of all models and types, there he has good earnings and for 6 months he dedicates himself to cut the finished product leaving it ready to be sold. Juan wishes to have his own machinery to begin his own business and for that he needs 15 thousand soles for capital which he hopes to have through agriculture. This is work that he has learned from his parents and has 2 years of experience growing potatoes, broad beans, green peas and garlic which he cares for and fertilizes during the agricultural season. Juan waits patiently for his harvest to mature and sells it in the wholesaler market in the city of Tarma where he gets good profits that allow him to get enough money to meet his goal and support his families’ expenses. Juan belongs to the “Manantiales de Yanama” (Springs of Yanama) Communal Bank and this is his first loan with MFP, he is grateful for the opportunity to progress and is committed to meeting his payments quotas on time. Juan with your support will use the money to buy 2 sacks of pea seeds to begin his agricultural work.

loans.use: buy two sacks of green pea seeds.

loans.name: René Antonio

texts.es: René Antonio de 40 años de edad, vive con su esposa Dora de de 37 años y sus tres hijos que se encuentran estudiando. Para René su familia lo es todo y es la razón por la cual día a día trabaja duramente para sacarlos adelante y poder darles una vida diferente. Él se dedica  a la fabricación y comercialización de productos de lamina, como palas, canales, graneros, entre otros.  Hace mucho tiempo que logro establecer este negocio en su hogar de residencia y es su principal fuente de ingresos. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio, abastecerlo con variedad de productos para que los clientes cada día lo prefieran más. Para esto necesita cierta cantidad de dinero con la cual no cuenta. Es por esta razón que recurre a INTEGRAL para solicitar este crédito que le permita comprar mayores cantidades de lamina lisa y poder fabricar más productos para poner a la disposición de los clientes. De esta manera espera lograr mejora su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
René Antonio is 40 years old.  He lives with his 37 year old wife, Dora, and their three children.  The children attend school.  To René his family is everything.  They are the reason he works hard day to day in order to get them ahead and to be able to give them a different life.

He makes and sells products made of sheet metal such as shovels, pipes and silos, among others.  He managed to establish his business at his house a long time ago.  It is his primary source of income.  His dream is to expand his business and to stock it with a variety of products so that his customers want his products more each day.

In order to do this he needs an amount of money that he does not have.  That is the reason he came to INTEGRAL to request this loan.  The loan will allow him to buy greater quantities of smooth sheeting.  He will then be able to make more products available to his customers.  This is the way he hopes to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy greater quantities of smooth, galvanized sheeting.

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.es:
Eugenio es un señor de 32 años el cual vive con su familia en una comunidad rural de Costa Rica llamada Mollejones de Platanares, Pérez Zeledón. Mollejones es una comunidad ubicada a 150 kilómetros al sur de la Provincia de San José, la capital de Costa Rica. Se encuentra a 850 metros sobre el nivel del mar. Ahí se cultivan hortalizas, café y además se desarrollan otras actividades como la crianza de ganado de engorde y de cerdos. Existen también algunos proyectos de agricultura orgánica y hortalizas en hidroponía. Además de la agricultura en la comunidad hay talleres mecánicos, un supermercado, pequeños restaurantes (sodas) y una mueblería.

Desde hace algún tiempo Don Eugenio se dedica a su granja agrícola. Dice que desde que inició el proyecto los resultados han sido buenos, ya que ha tenido una gran aceptación en su comunidad y los ingresos que ha generado lo han ayudado a sacar adelante a su familia.

En estos momentos lo que desea Don Eugenio es solicitar un préstamo por ¢600,000 (seiscientos mil colones) para comprar gallinas, alimento y equipo, que necesita para su proyecto de avicultura. Con esto espera que su microempresa crezca y llegue a generar más ingresos para mejorar su condición de vida.  
Don Eugenio forma parte de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Bancruce una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Como socio ha recibido un microcrédito que le han permitido crecer como microempresarios.
texts.en:
Eugenio, age 32, lives with his family in a rural community called called Mollejones de Platanares, Pérez Zeledón in Costa Rica .  Mollejones is a community that is 150 kilometers to the south of San José province, the capital of Costa Rica.  It is 850 meters above sea level.  

This is where he grows vegetables and coffee.  He also engages in other business activities like raising and fattening livestock and pigs.  There are also other organic farming and hydroponic vegetable projects.  In addition to the farming in the community there are mechanics shops, a supermarket, small restaurants (soda), and a furniture store.

Eugenio has devoted himself to farming for some time.  He says that since he started the project the results have been very good.  He has been widely accepted in his community, and the income it has generated has helped him get his family ahead.

Eugenio is now requesting a loan for ¢600,000 (six hundred thousand colones) in order to buy chickens, feed, and equipment that he needs for his poultry farming.  With the loan he hopes that his small business will grow and come to generate more income in order to improve his living conditions.

Eugenio is part of the Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Bancruce, one of the hundred member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.  As a member he has received a loan that has allowed him to grow as a businessman.

loans.use: to buy chickens, feed, and equipment that he needs for his poultry farming.

loans.name: Francisca Sarbelia

texts.es: Francisca Sarbelia D. 60 años D. edad, habita en casa propia con su esposo Miguel D. 61 años y sus dos nietos. Francisca  tiene un negocio humilD. instalado en una galera D. lamina en el cual venD. tortillas, ubicado en su hogar D. residencia. Ella es una mujer emprendedora y desD. mucho tiempo trabaja duramente para colaborar un poco con los gastos del hogar y sacar junto a su esposo adelante a sus nietos que son todo para ella. Cuenta con buena clientela y cada día la demanda D. sus ricas e higiénicas tortillas aumenta. Esto ha motivado a Francisca a solicitar a INTEGRAL este crédito que le permita invertir en las principales materias primas como: Maíz, agua, gas propano, harina etc. Con esta inversión espera y confía que obtendrá mayores ingresos que le permitirán seguir ayudando a su familia  y podrá brindarles una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Francisca Sarbelia, age 60, lives in her own house with her 61 year old husband, Miguel, and their two grandchildren.  Francisca has a modest business in a metal galley at her house where she sells tortillas.

She is an enterprising woman.  For a long time she has been working very hard in order to help a bit with the household expenses.  She works with her husband in order to get their grandchildren, who mean everything to her, ahead.  She has good customers, and every day the demand for her delicious and wholesome tortillas increases.

This has motivated Francisca to request a loan from INTEGRAL.  She will use this loan to buy the main raw materials like corn, water, propane gas, and flour, etc.  With this investment she is confident in expecting that she will get greater income.  This income will allow her to continue helping her family, and she will be able to give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, water, propane gas, and flour, etc.

loans.name: Maximiliana

texts.es: Maximiliana, es una mujer responsable y trabajadora, tiene 23 años; que junto a su esposo Miguel cuidan de su adorable hijo Swin, de 3 años. En armonía ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Yanama Alto. Hace tan solo 3 años, comenzó a incursionar en la agricultura, donde siembra arveja, papa y olluco; los que después de la cosecha los comercializa en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Paralelamente a su negocio ella se dedica a la ganadería, donde tiene animales entre ovejas, toros y las 3 vacas que le proporcionan la leche con la que elabora un queso al día, según cuenta obtiene una ganancia diaria de S/. 5 soles. Por ello ahora, está pensando incrementar la cantidad de animales para mejorar su producción de queso. Además de ser una persona muy ambiciosa y con muchos planes, también desea incursionar en el negocio de compra y venta de granos verdes, pues es un negocio rentable, y existen muy pocos acopiadores, además de tener más ingresos para el futuro de su familia. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama”, y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde trabaja con empeño y dedicación para seguir con sus objetivos. Por ello espera del apoyo de todos ustedes en la obtención de un pequeño préstamo. Maximiliana de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja y varios sacos de abono orgánico para comenzar con éxito su próximo sembrío.
texts.en: Maximiliana is a responsible and hardworking woman, she is 23 years old and with her husband Miguel, they take care of their adorable son, Swin who is 3 years old. They live in their own home in harmony located in the Yanama Alto hamlet. Just 3 years ago she began working in agriculture; she grows green peas, potatoes and olluco (a tuber). After she harvests her produce she sells them in the wholesaler market in the city of Tarma. Maximiliana is also into stock breeding and has various animals from sheep, bulls and 3 cows that give her milk that she uses to make a wheel of cheese a day and earns S/. 5 soles. Now she wants to increase the quantity of her animals to improve her cheese production. Despite being a very ambitious person with many goals, Maximiliana also wants to buy and sell greens since it is very profitable and there is little competition, she hopes to have greater earnings for her family’s future. She belongs to the “Manantiales de Yanama” (Springs of Yanama) Communal Bank and this is her sixth loan with MFP, she works with determination and dedication to meet her goals. This is why she needs your support for this small loan. Maximiliana to accomplish her goal, will use the money to buy a sack of green pea seeds and several sacks of organic manure to begin the next harvest season successfully.

loans.use: buy a sack of green pea seeds and sacks of organic manure.

loans.name: Nicanor

texts.es: Nicanor, es un hombre admirable y trabajador, tiene 56 años; que junto a su esposa Natividad, cuidó con amor y esmero de sus 9 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con 4 de ellos; en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Yanama Alto. Desde muy joven se dedicó al negocio de sus padres, “la agricultura”, tiene 30 años de experiencia en el rubro. En todo este tiempo logró obtener sus propios terrenos agrícolas, en donde siembra papa, arveja, olluco, zanahoria y flor de gladiolo; los que después de mucho esfuerzo, dedicación y trabajo, los comercializa en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, pero en campaña agrícola, los comercializa en la capital del país, donde obtiene mayores ganancias. Pero como buen hombre del campo, Nicanor también se dedica a la ganadería, donde gracias a sus 8 vacas, todas las mañanas saca leche y hace queso. Vendiéndolo a los comerciantes minoristas que visitan la zona; además de cuidar y vacunar a sus animales constantemente. Él está feliz de vivir en el campo por ello está trabajando para mejorar sus cultivos y así obtener mayor rentabilidad. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama”, y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, donde trabaja con empeño y dedicación. Por ello espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además de comprometerse en pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas. Nicanor de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 3 bolsas de semilla de arveja que oscila entre los s/. 550 nuevos soles cada uno, además de varios sacos de abono orgánico para comenzar con éxito su próximo sembrío.
texts.en: Nicanor is an admirable and hardworking man. He is 56 years old and with his wife, Natividad, they have taken care of their 9 children with a lot of love and hard work, at present, only 4 live with them in their own home in the Yanama Alto hamlet. From a young age, Nicanor worked in his parents' business, agriculture, he has 30 years of experience in this field. During all this time he was able to have his own plots of land where he grows potatoes, green peas, olluco (a tuber), carrots and gladiolus flowers which after a lot of effort, dedication and work he sells them in the wholesaler market in the city of Tarma. During the harvest season he sells his items in the country's capital where he gets greater profits. As a good country man, he also is a cattle raiser, thanks to his 8 cows each morning he goes out, milks them, and makes cheese, which he sells to retail merchants in the area. Nicanor takes care and vaccinates his cows frequently. He is happy to live in the countryside which is why he works hard to improve his crops and have more profits. He belongs to the “Manantiales de Yanama” (Springs of Yanama) Communal Bank and this is his seventh loan with MFP, he works with determination and dedication. This is why he hopes for your support, to continue to meet his goals and is committed to paying his quotas on time. Nicanor with your support will use the money to buy 3 sacks of green pea seeds that range around s/. 550 nuevos soles each, as well as sacks of organic manure to begin the next harvest season successfully.

loans.use: buy three sacks of green pea seeds and sacks of organic manure.

loans.name: Juana Candelaria

texts.es: Juana Candelaria D. 39 años D. edad, habita con su esposo Manuel D. 35 años y su hijo D. 14 en casa familiar. Juana es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en su hogar D. residencia. El negocio consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo D. varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para Juana lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atienD. con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza D. muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. Ella  sueña con dar a su hijo una mejor calidad D. vida y sabe que la única fuente D. ingresos es su pequeño negocio, por tanto no pueD. descuidarse D.  el, por lo que cada día trabaja duramente para por mantenerlo activo. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo D. productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y D. más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que D. esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Juana Candelaria is 39 years old and lives with her husband, Manuel who is 35, and their 14 year old son in a family home. Juana is an enterprising and hardworking woman. Some years ago she decided to start her own small business in her home. The business is a small store and with much work and dedication she has been able to keep it running for several years. Juana has a lot of customers since for her they are very important, she always takes care of them with a smile and kindness and also has what they need which is why she has been able to get the trust of many of her customers around her neighborhood. Juana dreams of giving her son a better quality of life and knows that the only source of income is her small business which is why she can’t neglect it and each day she works hard to keep it active. This is why she needs the loan from INTEGRAL, to be able to invest in her store and stock it with all types of products like: rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, candy, oil, paper, detergent and other appealing products for her customers. Juana trusts that this is the way that she will be able to see her dream come true.

loans.use: buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, candy, oil, paper, detergent, etc.

loans.name: José Alfredo

texts.es: José Alfredo de 47 años de edad, reside junto a su esposa de 40 años y su hijo en casa de su propiedad. José es un hombre increíble, creativo y sobre todo emprendedor. Junto con su esposa han logrado establecer un negocio en el cual venden diferentes productos como: de belleza, verduras y electrodomésticos que es su principal fuente de ingresos. José compra todo tipo de electrodomésticos usados y en malas condiciones, los repara y luego los pone a la venta, tiene un don innato para reparlos, es un experto. Hasta el momento el negocio ha respondido bien,  les da los ingresos suficientes para sobrevivir. Pero José no se quiere quedar con eso, su sueño es ver su negocio florecer en el cual los clientes puedan encontrar todo lo que buscan. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito para invertir en sus diversos negocios y tiene la fe puesta en  Dios que logrará su objetivo y podrá aspirar a una mejor vida. El  crédito lo invertirá  en la compra de verduras, productos de belleza y en electrodomésticos de segunda mano. Espera lograr lo que se propone y poder brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José Alfredo is 47 years old and lives with his wife who is 40 years old and their son in their own home. José is an incredible, creative and above all an enterprising man. With his wife they have been able to start their own business where they sell different products like: beauty products, vegetables and electronics, which is their main source of income. José will buy all types of used electronic goods as well as those in bad condition, he will repair and later sell them, as he has an innate ability to repair them, he is an expert. At the moment, the business has done well as it gives his family enough income to survive. But José doesn’t want to remain the same; his dream is to see his business grow where customers can find anything they need. This is why he has asked for the loan, to invest in his different businesses. José has placed his faith in God that he will be able to achieve his goals and that he will be able to aspire to have a better life. The loan will be used to buy vegetables, beauty products, and secondhand electronics. José hopes to be able to achieve everything he sets out to do and to be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy vegetables, beauty products and secondhand electronics.

loans.name: Percy

texts.es: Percy tiene 28 años, vive en el caserío de Yanama. Ahí formó su familia junto a Lourdes, su esposa desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos a los que quieren mucho y cuidan en su casa propia. Las mañanas de Percy son muy arduas, ya que se dedica a la siembra de diferentes actividades durante el día. Su mayor inspiración son sus hijos a los cuales desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Por eso trabaja con ahínco en sus terrenos agrícolas; donde siembra arveja, papa y flor de gladiolo. Ya tiene 10 años de experiencia en producir la tierra. En todo este tiempo logró obtener un buen mercado en la ciudad de Tarma y la capital del país, donde dependiendo a la demanda del producto viaja al lugar donde más le conviene. Cuenta por ejemplo, que en el mes de julio se dirige al mercado de “la parada” que se ubica en la capital del Perú, donde vende los alimentos que produce a un buen precio. También tiene 2 toros, con los cuales ara la tierra a diferentes agricultores, ganando así S/. 80 soles diarios. Pero ese servicio solo lo brinda en época de sembrío, por eso desea sacar mayor provecho a esa temporada. Y ya muy pronto lo conseguirá, pues comprará un toro más para que le ayude en el arado. Además de poseer ovejas con las que espera obtener un dinero extra, al momento de venderlas. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde espera el apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además de agradecer la confianza depositada en él. Percy de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 3 bolsas de semilla de arveja para comenzar con éxito su próxima siembra.
texts.en: Percy is 28 years old.  He lives in the village of Yanama.  There he started his family, together with Lourdes, his wife of three years.  They have 2 children that they love very much and care for in their own home.  Percy's mornings are very arduous, since he devotes himself to many activities during the day.  His greatest inspiration is his children, to whom he wants to give a better quality of life. That is why he works hard on his farmland, where he plants peas, potatoes, and gladiolus flowers. He already has 10 years of experience in farming.  During all that time, he has been able to get a good market in the city of Tarma and in the country's capital. Depending on the demand for the product, he will travel to the place of greatest advantage to him.  As an example, in July he goes to the "La Parada" market located in Peru's capital, where he sells the food he produces at a good price.  He also has 2 bulls, with which he plows the land of various farmers, earning 80 soles a day in this way.  But he only provides this service during harvest time, so he would like to take greater advantage of that season.  And soon he will be able to do it, since he will buy another bull to help him with the plowing.  He also has sheep, from which he hopes to earn some extra money when he sells them.  He belongs to the "Manantiales de Yanama" communal bank, and this is his fifth loan with MFP.  He hopes for the support of all of you to continue with his goals. He is also thankful for the confidence placed in him.  Percy, once he obtains this support, will use the money he is asking for to purchase 3 bags of pea seed to successfully begin his next harvest.

loans.use: to purchase 3 bags of pea seeds

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.en:
Jose Antonio is 76 years old and married. He has five children. 

He was born in Sicuani and now lives in the city of Cusco. He is a retired lawyer and is happy to be spending time with his family. 

He is asking for a loan in order to invest in his personal health by purchasing vitamins and medications. In addition, he will use the loan to pay for household necessities such as the water and light bills. Lastly, he plans to purchase animals such as chickens and guinea pigs to raise so that he can eventually eat them. 

He is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and medication to maintain his health.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.es: Anastacia tiene 43 años, vive en el caserío de Yanama Alto. Ahí formó su familia junto a Paulino, su esposo desde hace 8 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero viven solo con 2 de ellos: Karol y Ángela en su casa propia. Ella es el pilar de su familia y su asociación. El ser tesorera de su banco comunal, le ayudó a ser responsable y a comprometerse con el desarrollo de cada uno de sus miembros. Todos estos nuevos aprendizajes los practica en sus diferentes actividades económicas. Hace 22 años que comenzó con la agricultura, sembrando arveja y papa en todas sus variedades. Según cuenta tiene diferentes terrenos agrícolas que se sitúan en los caseríos de Huancamarca, Manchay Alto y la costa peruana de Chancay. A mediados de año, que es cosecha grande, ella se dirige a la capital donde vende los alimentos que produce a un mayor precio. Además de dedicarse a la ganadería, donde ara la tierra con la ayuda de sus 2 toros y vende la leche que produce las 2 vacas que posee. Toda esta actividad los realiza con el apoyo de su esposo, ya que hace poco incursionó en el negocio de abarrotes, donde vende productos de primera necesidad a los diferentes pobladores del lugar. Por lo que desea ahorrar lo necesario para adquirir una movilidad y poder trasladarse con mayor facilidad. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama” y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además se compromete en pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas. Anastacia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en completar el capital necesario para la compra de 8 bolsas de semilla de arveja y varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para comenzar la temporada de siembra grande que se avecina.
texts.en: Anastacia is 43 years old and lives in the village of Yanama Alto.  There she started her family with Paulino, her husband of 8 years.  They have 6 children, but they live with only two of them, Karol and Ángela, in their own home.  She is the pillar of her family and her association.  Being treasurer of her communal bank helped her be responsible and to commit herself to the development of each one of its members.  She applies all that she has learned to her various business activities. She started farming 22 years ago, planting peas and potatoes of all varieties.  She says she has different farmlands in the villages of Huancamarca, Manchay Alto, and the Peruvian coast of Chancay. In the middle of the year, which is a large harvest, she goes to the capital, where she sells the food she produces at a high price.  She also raises livestock; she plows the land with the help of her two bulls, and sells the milk her two cows produce.  She does all of these activities with the help of her husband, who not long ago began a grocery business, where he sells staple products to people who live in the area.  She wants to save enough to acquire transportation and be able to move around more easily.  She belongs to the "Manantiales de Yanama" communal bank, and this is her sixth loan with MFP.  She hopes for the support of all of you in order to continue with her goals.  She also promises to make her payments on time.  Anastacia, upon receiving this support, will use the money she is asking for to purchase 8 bags of pea seed and several bags of natural fertilizer to begin the big planting season that is approaching.

loans.use: to purchase 8 bags of pea seed and several bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Lucia Morena

texts.es: Lucia Morena de 50 años de edad, reside sola en su casa en zona rural del país. Ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado y a la comercialización de lácteos como: leche, queso, crema, etc. que extrae  de dichos animales. Lucia es una mujer ejemplar que no se da por vencida, le echa ganas a la vida. Cada día se levanta muy temprano para tener lista la rica leche y poder ofrecerla a sus clientes que con mucha frecuencia la buscan ya que la ofrece higienica y con buenos precios.  Es una mujer muy posítiva le encanta la crianza de animales y no quiere dejar de hacerlo ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos, ella lo toma como su pasatiempo favorito. Ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar una nueva vaca lechera que por lo menos dé diario unas veinte botellas, ya que se ha quedado con pocas y no le dan abasto para satisfacer la demanda de lácteos por parte de sus clientes. Con esto espera cubrir una mayor demanda y mejorar sus ingresos que le permitan aspirar a una mejor vida.
texts.en: Lucia is 50 years old and lives by herself in a rural area of the country. She makes a living raising livestock and selling dairy products such as milk, cheese, cream and other items using the milk from her cows. Lucia is an exemplary woman who will not give in and wants to make the most out of life. Every day she gets up very early to have her rich milk ready to offer to her customers, who come by often because of the clean conditions and good prices she offers. She is a very positive woman who loves raising her animals and does not want to give it up since it's her primary source of income, and she calls it her favorite pastime. She plans to use this loan from Kiva partner Apoyo Integral to purchase a new milk cow that can produce at least 20 bottles a day since she currently doesn't have enough to satisfy all her customers' demands. With the cow, she hopes to be able to cover her increased demand and improve her income to give her hope for a better life.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: José Alejandro

texts.es:
El señor José Alejandro y su esposa la señora Maria De Lourdes tienen tres hijos que actualmente están estudiando. 
Están solicitando un  préstamo ya que tiene que pagar la inscripción de la escuela para que sus hijo puedan estudios este siclo escolar, también necesitan comprar los cuadernos, lápices, libros y uniformes, no cuentan con el dinero necesario para poder cubrir estas necesidades escolares. 
Don José Alejandro se encargara de pagar el crédito con una parte del sueldo que recibe como trabajador de una iglesia. 
Desean que sus hijos tengan el estudio necesario para un buen futuro.
texts.en: José Alejandro and his wife Maria De Lourdes have three children who are currently in school. They are requesting a loan because they have to pay registration fees for their children for this school year, and they also need to buy notebooks, pencils, books and uniforms. They don't have the money to cover all these necessary educational expenses. José Alejandro is responsible for paying the loan with a part of the salary he receives for working at a church. He and his wife want their children to have the necessary education for a good future.

loans.use: to pay for registration fees and school supplies.

loans.name: Sebastiana

texts.es: Sebastiana tiene 41 años es una mujer amable y sincera. Ella cuenta que hace 18 años conformó su familia junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos: Miguel y Doris. A los cuales cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Yanama Alto. Está luchadora mujer se dedica a la agricultura, principal actividad económica del lugar. Hace 18 años que comenzó a sembrar arveja y papa en todas sus variedades, los cuales cuida con mucho ahínco. Además de dedicarse a la  ganadería con el cuidado de sus 4 vacas a la que cuida con principal atención. “Tengo una vaca preñada, muy pronto dará un becerro, por lo que tendré uno más”, afirma. Con la adquisición de sus ovejas y la leche de sus vacas, puede tener un ingreso extra al hogar. Además de tener el apoyo de su esposo, quien trabaja en una mina de Talco, donde gana una buena suma de dinero. Pero hace poco, sufrió una enfermedad producto de los químicos al que se expone. Por ello, Sebastiana, desea abrir una pequeña bodega de productos de primera necesidad, donde puede tener más ingresos y así mantener a su esposo junto a su familia. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde agradece la oportunidad de emprender sus objetivos. Además se compromete en ser una socia activa y responsable. Sebastiana de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja que oscila entre S/. 500 nuevos soles cada una.
texts.en: Sebastiana is a 41-year-old friendly and sincere woman. She married her husband 18 years ago and together they have two children: Miguel and Doris. She cares for her children in her own home located in the hamlet of Yanama Alto, Peru. This hard-working woman makes a living in agriculture, the main economic activity in her area. She started planting all varieties of peas and potatoes 18 years ago and has cared for them diligently.
