She also dedicates herself to livestock, caring for four cows and giving them personal attention. "I have a pregnant cow who very shortly will have a calf, so I'll have one more," she attests. With the acquisition of some sheep along with the milk from her cows, she can bring extra income to her household. She also has the support of her husband, who works at a mine in Talco and earns a good amount of money. But a little while ago he became sick after being exposed to some chemicals. Because of that, Sebastiana wishes to open a small general store of primary-need products so she can earn more income and provide for her husband and her family. She belongs to the "Manantiales de Yanama" community bank, and this is her first loan with Kiva partner MFP, whom she thanks for the opportunity to undertake her objectives. She promises to be an active and responsible member of her community bank. With your support, Sebastiana will use the loan to invest in the purchase of two bags of pea seeds worth 500 soles apiece.

loans.use: to purchase two bags of pea seeds.

loans.name: Elia Elizabeth

texts.es: Elia Elizabeth D. 40 años D. edad, vive en casa familiar con su esposo Jorge D. 40 años quien al igual que Elia es comerciante y su pequeña hija. Elia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora. Ella se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza por catalogo. Estas ventas las realiza D. manera ambulante en las principales zonas D. la comunidad donD. ella resiD., además en su casa con vecinos y amigos. Es una mujer que con su amabilidad se gana la confianza D. sus clientes y esto le ha ayudado a establecer un buen número D. clientes fijos. Ella sueña con ver a su pequeña hija en mejores condiciones a las que ahora tiene, y es por esta razón que lucha día a día para mejorar D. alguna manera su situación económica. Ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en variedad D. artículos D. belleza que le permitan atraer a mas clientes que le lleven a aumentar sus ventas y por enD. sus ingresos. Con el crédito espera comprar variedad D. cremas, champu, jabón, lociones y D. mas artículos atractivos para los clientes. Tiene gran confianza que con su trabajo y ayuda D. Dios logrará su sueño.
texts.en:
Elia Elizabeth is 40 years old and lives in the family home with her husband Jorge and their young daughter. Her husband is also 40 and works as a merchant. Elia is a hardworking and enterprising woman who sells beauty products through catalogs. She conducts her sales as a traveling merchant in the community where she lives. Elia also sells at home to her neighbors and friends. She is a friendly woman who gains the trust of others, which explains why she has several established customers. Elia dreams of seeing her young daughter live in better conditions than their current situation. For this reason, she strives each day to somehow improve her financial condition.

She decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral to invest in a variety of beauty products, which will allow her to attract more customers and increase her sales and income. With this loan, she hopes to buy a variety of crèmes, shampoo, soaps, lotions, and other products that are popular with her customers. She has great confidence that through her work and with help from God she will be able to fulfill her dream.

loans.use: to purchase crèmes, shampoo, soaps, lotions, and other products.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es: Haydee, es una mujer tímida pero trabajadora de, 32 años; junto a su esposo Hernán, cuidan de sus 2 hijos: Hilder y Melina, en armonía ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Patay. El trabajo al que se dedica, es la agricultura, sus principales sembríos constan de arveja, habas, papa, flor y maíz, ya tiene 12 años de experiencia. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cortar las flores de papa, ya que es señal de una pronta cosecha. La dedicación que le brinda a sus terrenos agrícolas le permiten obtener buenas ganancias en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, lugar donde comercializa su cosecha; pero las flores de gladiolo los vende en el mercado central de la capital del país. Sus planes son sembrar flor de gladiolo y mantener en buenas condiciones su plantación de habas para que le proporcione buenos frutos en la temporada de cosecha. Además de tener sembríos de maíz que comenzará a dar fruto en los primeros meses del año que viene, así asegura su ganancia por temporadas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Picaflores de Patay”, y esté es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde obtiene buenas experiencias para la mejora de sus sembríos. Por eso espera el apoyo de todos ustedes para seguir con su progreso. Haydee de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja y 5 bolsas de fertilizantes naturales para su cultivos de maíz que sembró hace un mes.
texts.en:
Haydee, age 32, is a shy but hardworking woman. She and her husband Hernán take care of their two children, Hilder and Melina, and live in harmony in their own home in the village of Patay. Haydee engages in farming. Her main crops consist of peas, beans, potatoes, flowers, and corn. She has 12 years of experience. What she enjoys most about her work is trimming the potato flowers since it signals that the harvest is approaching. Her dedication to her land allows her to generate good earnings at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma where she sells her harvest. However, she sells gladiola flowers at the central market in Lima. Her plans are to plant gladiola flowers and maintain good conditions for planting beans so that she can produce good output at harvest time. In addition, she has crops of corn that will bear fruit during the first few months of the upcoming year, which will secure her seasonal income.

Haydee belongs to the Communal Bank “Los Picaflores de Patay” and is receiving her eighth loan from MFP, which has provided her good experiences that have helped to improve her crops. With everyone’s support, she hopes to continue her progress. By obtaining assistance, Haydee will invest the money she requested in a bag of pea seeds and five sacks of natural fertilizers for the crop of corn that she planted a month ago.

loans.use: to purchase a bag of pea seeds and five sacks of natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Juanita Laura

texts.es:
La señora Juanita tiene ya más de tres años con su negocio de venta de ropa. 
Está solicitando un préstamo para invertir en comprar mercancía que es juguetes, accesorios para bebes, zapatos y artículos de belleza, por el momento no cuenta con el capital necesario para realizar la inversión que le esta haciendo falta a su negocio, solicita su cooperación para este crédito, que pagara con las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas. 
Desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y darle los necesario para que tengan una buenas educación.
texts.en:
Juanita has been in the business of clothes sales for more than three years. She requests a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise, such as toys, baby accessories, shoes, and beauty products. She currently does not have the capital funds she needs to make this required business investment. She requests your cooperation for this loan and she will re3pay it with the profits she earns from her sales.

She wants to improve the quality of life for her family and to provide them with what they need in order to have a good education.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es: Esther, es una mujer seria de 36 años, que junto a su esposo Nildo, cuidan de sus 2 hijas: Mayli y Gabriela. En armonía familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Patay. Su rostro sereno y pasivo es sinónimo de su éxito, ya que estar feliz y sentirse tranquila es lo más preciado que tiene. La agricultura es su principal actividad económica, ya tiene 8 años dedicándose a la siembra de flor de gladiolo, arveja, papa y zanahoria. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder comercializar sus cosechas, ya que puede ver el fruto de tanto esfuerzo. Una vez al mes viaja a la capital del país a comercializar la flor de gladiolo que siembra. Par el futuro está trabajadora mujer desea seguir sembrando en mayores cantidades, por ello ahora se está preparando para su cosecha de arveja y flor de gladiolo, que está segura le brindará muchas ganancias. Ella se encuentra muy feliz de ser autoridad en su banco comunal, donde aprende a salir adelante y valerse por si misma. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Picaflores de Patay”, y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde es una socia responsable, sincera y sobre todo solidaria. Por ello desea el apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Esther de recibir su apoyo, invertirá en la compra de 11 sacos de fertilizantes naturales que oscilan entre S/. 106 nuevos soles cada uno, además de semilla de arveja de la variedad “súper”.
texts.en:
Esther, age 36, is a serious woman who lives with her husband Nildo. They take care of their two daughters, Mayli and Gabriela, and live in their own home in the village of Patay. The serene and passive look on her face is a sign of her success. She feels happy and at peace with the most precious things she possesses. Farming is her main business activity. Esther already has eight years of experience planting gladiola flowers, peas, potatoes, and carrots. What she enjoys most about her work is being able to sell her harvest because she is able to see the fruit of her labor. Once a month, she travels to Lima to sell the gladiola flowers that she produces. In the future, this hardworking woman wants to continue planting in large quantities but for now she is preparing to harvest her pea and gladiola flower crops, which will secure a good income. She is very pleased with the expertise of her Communal Bank, which has taught her how to move forward and get by on her own.

Esther belongs to the Communal Bank “Los Picaflores de Patay” and is receiving her fifth loan from MFP. She has demonstrated that she is a responsible, sincere, and most of all, supportive member. For this reason, she hopes to receive everyone’s support so that she can continue with her goals. With the assistance she received, Esther will invest in the purchase of 11 sacks of natural fertilizers that cost 106 PEN each. She will also buy a bag of seeds for planting peas of the “super” variety.

loans.use: to purchase 11 sacks of natural fertilizers and a bag of pea seeds.

loans.name: Alida

texts.es: Alida, es una mujer trabajadora de 24 años, que convive con Percy. Ambos tiene 3 hijos: María, Cris y Yamile. En armonía ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Patay. Hace 5 años que en compañía de su esposo, comenzaron a incursionar en la agricultura, su principal actividad económica. Desde las primeras horas del día, Alida cuidada de sus cultivos de papa, arveja y flor de gladiolo. Lo que más le gusta a ella son los momentos de la merienda, pues ahí puede pasar un tiempo agradable junto a su esposo. De igual manera, le agrada vender su producción en el mercado mayorista de Tarma. Pero como padres responsables Percy, su esposo, también se dedica al arado de la tierra con los 2 toros que poseen; ganando un promedio de S/. 60 a S/. 70 nuevos soles diarios. Ahora ella desea mejorar sus sembríos, pues los planes son aprovechar al máximo su cosecha de flor de gladiolo que se encuentra en la mitad de su crecimiento. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Picaflores de Patay”, y esté es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde gusta de compartir momentos de aprendizaje en cada reunión que asume con su asociación. Por ello espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para seguir con sus objetivos. Alida, sembrará 7 sacos de semilla de flor de gladiolo; por ello de recibir su apoyo invertirá en la compra de semillas y 4 sacos de fertilizantes naturales, que es lo necesario para que comience con éxito su sembrío.
texts.en:
Alida, age 24, is a hardworking woman who lives with Percy. They have three children: María, Cris, and Yamile. All of them live in harmony in their home in the village of Patay. Five years ago, Alida and her husband began farming as their main business activity. From the early morning hours of the day, Alida looks after her crops of potatoes, peas, and gladiola flowers. What she enjoys most are the moments when she can have a meal and spend time with her husband. She is equally grateful to be selling her crops at the wholesale market in Tarma. Being responsible parents, she and her husband Percy spend time plowing other people’s land with the two bulls that they own. They earn an average of 60 to 70 PEN each day. Now she wants to improve her crops. Alida has plans to maximize her harvest of gladiola flowers since her crops are halfway through the growth cycle.

She is a member of the Communal Bank “Picaflores de Patay” and is receiving her fifth loan from MFP. Alida enjoys the time she gets to learn with the other members at each group meeting. She hopes to gain everyone’s support so that she can continue with her goals. Alida plans to plant seven sacks of gladiola seeds. For this reason, she will invest in the purchase of seeds and four sacks of natural fertilizers so that she can have a successful planting.

loans.use: to purchase gladiola seeds and four sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Rosa Celia

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es socia del banco comunal Unión Progresista, vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana, en esta parroquia se puede admirar hermosos paisajes, su gente es muy amable y cálida, mantienen su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

La Señora Rosa tiene 28 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 11, 9 y 6 años de edad, todos sus hijos están estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en la construcción, la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad.

Doña Rosa labora en la agricultura, lo que cosecha es para su consumo y si hay sobrantes lo vende, también se dedica a la cría de cerdos, gallinas y ganado a los que los vende en su comunidad.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo  va a invertir en la compra de m una vaca. 

Su meta es  llegar a tener más animales para la venta.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the communal bank "Union Progresista", meaning "Progressive Union". She lives in the Parish of Santa Ana. Beautiful scenery can be admired from this Parish and the population is kind and welcoming. They maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors and they are agriculturists and farmers.

Rosa is 28 years old, married, and from her relationship she has conceived 3 children, aged 11, 9 and 6. All of her children attend school in the neighborhood. Her husband works in construction. The house in which they live is their own property.

Rosa works in agriculture and the harvest is for their consumption. If there is produce left over, she sells it. She also raises pigs, poultry, and cattle and she sells them within her community. 

This is the first loan she accesses through her communal bank and she will invest it in the purchase of a cow.

Her goal is to have more livestock to sell.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: Wilfredo, es un hombre soltero y trabajador de 32 años, que vive en compañía de sus padres Lucia y Alejo, a los que ama mucho. En armonía familiar ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Patay. Como joven tiene muchas ambiciones. Estudió Farmacia en un instituto reconocido de la localidad; pero sus deseos son consolidarse en un negocio propio, por ello hace 5 años comenzó a dedicar su tiempo y sus fuerzas en la agricultura. En los terrenos de sus padres siembra una variedad de productos como: arveja, papa y flor de gladiolo a gran escala. Asimismo, tiene un botiquín lleno de medicinas, que vende a los pobladores de su localidad cuando se sienten enfermos. En todo este tiempo le fue muy bien, tanto así; que logró obtener un auto propio con el que también hace trasporte público. Ahora consiente de que el precio de venta de los productos en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma, son muy buenos desea mejorar la calidad de sus productos. Por eso comenzó a buscar tierras nuevas y descansadas para obtener frutos nutritivos, su secreto para su obtención es sembrar en época de invierno. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Picaflores de Patay”, y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde se siente realizado, ya que el apoyo económico y las constantes charlas que recibe le ayudan a progresar. Por eso desea seguir obteniendo el soporte de todos ustedes. Wilfredo de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para su próxima siembra de flor de gladiolo.
texts.en:
Wilfredo, age 32, is single and a hardworking gentleman. He lives with his parents, Lucia and Alejo, who he loves very much. They live in harmony as a family in their own home in the village of Patay. Being a young man, Wilfredo has many ambitions. He studied pharmacology at a recognized local institute, but his dreams came together by establishing his own business. Five years ago, Wilfredo started devoting his time and efforts into farming. He grows a variety of crops in mass quantities on his parents’ land such as peas, potatoes, and gladiola flowers. In addition, he has a pharmacy that is stocked with medicines that he sells to the local villagers whenever they are sick. Throughout this entire time, Wilfredo has done very well. He also owns an automobile that he makes available for public transportation. Now he is aware that good prices are being offered for products sold at the central market in Tarma, so he wants to improve the quality of his crops. For this reason, Wilfredo has started to look for additional farmland that has had a chance to rest so that he can produce fruits that have nutritional value. His secret to obtaining a good harvest is to plant during the winter season.

Wilfredo belongs to the Communal Bank “Los Picaflores de Patay” and is receiving his sixth loan from MFP, where he feels fulfilled as a member. The financial support and the frequent seminars that are offered have helped him to advance. For this reason, he hopes to gain everyone’s support. With the assistance he received, Wilfredo will invest the money he requested in the purchase of several sacks of natural fertilizers for his next crop of gladiola flowers.

loans.use: to purchase several sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda, es una mujer luchadora de 49 años, que vive junto a su esposo Antonio, con el que educó y sacó adelante a sus 3 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con uno de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Patay. Su esfuerzo y dedicación, hicieron que su familia sea su mayor orgullo.  “La agricultura”, su principal actividad económica desde hace 20 años, hizo posible que pagará los estudios superiores de sus hijos, los cuales le visitan constantemente y se siente feliz de tener el amor de sus nietos, a los que consiente mucho. Sus principales cultivos, son  flor de gladiolo, arveja y papa, los que tenazmente cuida y fertiliza; pues sabe que de eso depende la buena venta en cada cosecha, ya que vende en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, y dependiendo de la calidad, los lleva a la capital del país, donde le pagan mayor precio. Ella tiene sembrado gladiolo y arveja que pronto cosechará y para lo cual se está preparando. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Picaflores de Patay”, y esté es el quinto crédito que tiene con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además de ser responsable y honesta con el desarrollo de su banco comunal. Yolanda de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 7 sacos de fertilizantes naturales para nutrir sus sembríos de arveja y flor de gladiolo que dentro de unos meses cosechará.
texts.en:
Yolanda, age 49, is a hardworking woman who lives with her husband Antonio. Together they have been able to succeed on behalf of their children and provide them an education. At the moment, only one child lives with them in their home in the village of Patay. Through effort and dedication, Yolanda and her husband formed a family that gives them great pride. Farming has been her main business activity for the past 20 years and has made it possible for her to pay for her children’s higher education. Her children visit her frequently and she is happy to have the love of her grandchildren who she spoils. Yolanda’s main crops are gladiola flowers, peas, and potatoes. She provides her crops frequent care and fertilization because she knows this attention will result in good sales at the end of each harvest. Yolanda sells her crops at the wholesale market in Tarma. Depending on the quality of her crops, she will even take them to Lima where she can get a better price. She planted gladiolas and peas early and they will soon be ready to harvest.

Yolanda is a member of the Communal Bank “Picaflores de Patay” and is receiving her fifth loan from MFP. She hopes to receive everyone’s support so that she can continue with her goals. In addition, she wants to be responsible and honest with the development of her Communal Bank. With the support she received, Yolanda will invest the money she requested in the purchase of seven sacks of natural fertilizers for her pea and gladiola crops that will be harvested in a few months.

loans.use: to purchase seven sacks of natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Rosa Amalia

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es socia del banco comunal Unión Progresista, vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana, en esta parroquia se puede admirar hermosos paisajes, desde su centro se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente es muy amable y cálida, mantienen su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

Doña Rosa tiene 50 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, cinco de ellos son casados e independientes, su último hijo tiene discapacidad, también se encuentra a cargo de dos nietos uno está estudiando en el colegio y otro en la escuela. Su esposo labora en la construcción y la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Rosa labora en la agricultura, lo que siembra para su consumo, como pasa en su casa cría  gallinas, cuyes y cerdos a los que los vende en su propia comunidad.

En el banco comunal se encuentra en su segundo crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos y gallinas. 

Su meta es  criar más animales.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the communal bank "Union Progresista", meaning "Progressive Union". She lives in the Parish of Santa Ana. Beautiful scenery can be admired from this Parish and the population is kind and welcoming. They maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors and they are agriculturists and farmers.

Rosa is 50 years old and she is married. The fruit of her marriage is 6 children. They are all grown, and five of them are married and independent. Her youngest son is handicapped. She also has two grandchildren in her care. One of them is in high school and the other is in primary school. Her husband works in construction and the house in which they live is their own property.

Rosa works in agriculture and what she plants is for their consumption. And because she spends her time at home, she raises poultry, guinea pigs, and pigs which are sold within her own community. 

She is on her second loan through her communal bank and she will invest it in the purchase of pigs and poultry.

Her goal is to have more livestock to raise.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and poultry.

loans.name: Mas Que Vencedores Group

texts.es: CARMEN DE 35 AÑOS DE EDAD,ES SOCIA DEL GRUPO MAS QUE VENCEDORES .CARMEN  TIENE ACTUALMENTE  UNA CLINICA  PROPIA  QUE COMPARTE CON SU  HERMANO ,QUE ES DE LA MISMA PROFESION .AMBOS SACAN ADELANTE ESTA CLINICA  GRACIAS AL APOYO DE SU MADRE .CARMEN SOLICITA ESTE PRESTAMO PARA PODER IMPLEMENTAR LA CLINICA  CON ULTIMOS Y NOVEDOSOS EQUIPOS NECESARIOS PARA  LA CLINICA  Y ASI  QUE SUS CLIENTES SE SIENTAN SATISFECHOS  POR EL SERVICIO QUE BRINDA ESTA CLINICA .CARMEN QUISIERA PARA EL FUTURO SER UNA DE LAS MEJORES CLINICAS QUE  HAY EN LA CIUDAD DE HUANCAYO.LA SRA CARMEN SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA A LADO IZQUIERDO DE LA SRA QUE VISTE UN CHALECO COLOR ROJO Y BUZO COLOR MARRON .LA SRA CARMEN VISTE UNA CASACA  COLOR NEGRO Y PANTALON COLOR NEGRO,TIENE EN LA MANO  SU CARTERA  COLOR ANARANJADO
texts.en:
Carmen is 35 years old and a member of the group “Mas Que Vencedores” (More than Conquerors). She currently manages her own clinic with her brother, who is also in the same profession. Both of them are able to move forward with their clinic thanks to the support they receive from their mother.

Carmen is requesting this loan so that she can keep her clinic in operation with the latest and newest pieces of equipment. This will allow her customers to be satisfied with the services offered by the clinic. In the future, Carmen wants to have one of the best clinics in the city of Huancayo.

In the photograph, Sra. Carmen is standing on the left side next to the woman wearing a red vest and brown trousers. Sra. Carmen can be seen wearing a black jacket and black trousers and holding an orange purse in her hand.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for her clinic.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica, tiene 37 años, se caracteriza por ser alegre. Vive junto a su esposo Luis y sus 3 hijos a los que quiere mucho. En armonía familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Patay. Ella es muy feliz, todas las mañanas desde las primeras horas de la mañana junto a su esposo Luis, se dirige a sus sembríos de papa, olluco, arvejas y habas, los cuales siembra en sus propios terrenos agrícolas, que gracias al trabajo conjunto que realizan como socios y esposos lograron adquirir. Ya tienen 11 años dedicándose a la agricultura, y lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder pasar la mayor parte de su tiempo en compañía de su familia. Por el desarrollo y éxito de su negocio, desea más adelante ahorrar el dinero suficiente para poder adquirir un camión y, de esa manera minimizar los gastos de trasporte que realizan de la ciudad al mercado mayorista de la ciudad, donde lleva a comercializar su cosecha. Además de ayudarle en su negocio de compra y venta de animales, que consiste en llevar toros, vacas, burros y carneros a la feria ganadera que se realiza en la ciudad de Huancayo, donde vende a un buen precio cada ejemplar. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Picaflores de Patay”, y este es el quinto crédito que tiene con MFP, donde es una socia trabajadora y muy puntual en sus cuotas. Razón por la cual espera del apoyo de todos ustedes en la obtención de un pequeño préstamo. Angélica de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de toros y vacas.
texts.en:
Angelica, 37, is known for being happy. She lives together with her husband, Luis, and her 3 children whom she loves very much. They live in harmony in their own home in the village of Patay. She is very happy. Every morning from very early she goes to work with her husband Luis, managing her crops of potatoes, ulluco, peas, and broad beans. They plant them on their own land which she and her husband were able to acquire thanks to their hard work together as partners and spouses. 

They have been farming for 11 years and what they like most is being able to spend most of their time together as a family. For the development and success of their business, in the future they want to save enough money to be able to buy a truck so that they can reduce the cost of transportation to the wholesale market in the city where they sell their harvest. It would also help with their business buying and selling animals, which consists of carrying bulls, cows, donkeys and rams to the cattle market in the city of Huancayo. There they sell each specimen for a good price. 

She belongs to the village bank "Picaflores de Patay" and this is her 5th loan with MFP where she is a hardworking member and is very punctual in her payments. For this reason she hopes for all of your support in obtaining this small loan. Angelica will invest the requested loan in the purchase of bulls and cows.

loans.use: to buy a bull and a cow.

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Unión Progresista, vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana,  en esta parroquia se puede admirar hermosos paisajes, desde su centro se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente es muy amable y cálida, mantienen su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

La Señora. María tiene 56 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 11 hijos, 5 de sus hijos son casados e independientes, 4 de sus hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente y sus dos últimos hijos uno le ayuda en la casa y la otra  estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. También cuida a tres nietos que están estudiando en la escuela. Su esposo trabaja como guardia de seguridad, la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.

Doña María se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y al cuidado de su familia, ella se da tiempo para criar ganado, cerdos, cuyes y gallinas los que los vende en su propia comunidad.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 10 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir para la compra de abono para mejorar sus potreros.
 
Su meta es terminar su casa ya que aun le hacen falta algunos acabados.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the communal bank "Union Progresista", meaning "Progressive Union". She lives in the Parish of Santa Ana. Beautiful scenery can be admired from this Parish and the population is kind and welcoming. They maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors and they are agriculturists and farmers.

Maria is 56 years old and she is married. The fruit of her marriage is her 11 children. Five of her children are married and independent, 4 of them are working and contribute financially. Of her two youngest children, one helps with the household chores, and the other attends primary school in the city. She also has three grandchildren in her care and they are in high school. Her husband is a security guard and the house in which they live is their own property.

Maria spends her time handling the household obligations and taking care of her family. She takes the time to raise cattle, pigs, guinea pigs, and poultry which are sold within her own community. 

She has been with her communal bank for 10 years and her new loan will be invested in the purchase of fertilizer to improve her pastures.

Her goal is to finish building her house, especially because some finishing touches are still left to be done.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 39 years old and married. She has two children, and one is in school. Vilma works very hard to provide for them.

Vilma runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Vilma has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sugar, soap, shampoo, biscuits, etc. 

In the future, Vilma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Teodosia

texts.es: Teodosia, es una luchadora mujer de 43 años, que en compañía de su esposo Medardo, cuidan de sus 2 hijos. En unión familiar ellos viven en casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Patay. El trabajo al que se dedica es la agricultura; desde hace 10 años se dirige a los campos de cultivo donde cuida de sus plantaciones de arveja, papa, flor de gladiolo, habas y maíz. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder disfrutar de la tranquilidad del trabajo en el campo; “también me gusta comercializar mi cosecha, pues veo concretado tanto esfuerzo”, menciona. Ahora tiene pensado renovar sus plantaciones de flor de gladiolo, ya que se acerca la temporada donde las flores tienen mayor demanda. Además de trabajar muy duro en sus cultivos de papa y arveja que cosechará en el próximo mes, por lo que augura buenos ingresos para esa temporada. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Picaflores de Patay”, y esté es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes. Además es una socia responsable y comprometida con los pagos que hace a su asociación. Teodosia de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja para lo que necesitará también 6 sacos de fertilizantes naturales para comenzar con éxito esta siembra.
texts.en:
Teodosia, 43, a is hardworking woman who, together with her husband Medardo, takes care of her two children. They live together in their own home in the village of Patay. Teodosia works in farming; for 10 years she has managed the the fields of crops where she takes care of her plantings of peas, potatoes, gladiolus flowers, fava beans and corn. What she likes most about her work is being able to enjoy the peacefulness of working in the field. "I also like to sell my harvest because I see all of my efforts become tangible," she mentions. 

Now she wants to renovate her gladiolus plantings since the season is approaching when they're most in demand. She also will work very hard on her potato and pea crops which will be harvested next month, which should bring good income this season. 

She belongs to the village bank "Picaflores de Patay" and this is her 6th credit with MFP. She hopes for all of your support. She is a responsible and committed member who makes her payments on time. Teodosia will invest the requested loan in the purchase of 2 bags of pea seeds, for which she will need 6 sacks of natural fertilizer to get the plantings started successfully.

loans.use: to buy 2 bags of pea seeds and 6 sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy, de 32 años vive en el caserío de Patay, ahí formó su familia junto a Teófilo, su esposo desde hace 13 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia. Hace algunos años junto a su esposo cuidaban de sus sembríos de arveja y flor de gladiolo. La agricultura, su principal actividad económica, le brindó el dinero necesario para poder sobrevivir. Pero hace poco se presentó la oportunidad de trabajar en la construcción de una hidroeléctrica, en donde su esposo Teófilo no desaprovecho la oportunidad y ahora se encuentra laborando, obteniendo así un dinero extra para el hogar. Mientras que Nancy toma la riendas del hogar, en el cuidado de sus cultivos, donde siembra en sociedad ya que no tiene el apoyo de su esposo y comercializa en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Además de incursionar hace poco en la apertura de una tienda de dulces donde obtiene un dinero extra, que le ayuda en los gastos de educación de sus hijos que estudian lejos, ya que desea brindarles una buena educación. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Picaflores de Patay” y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde espera de la colaboración de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además se compromete en ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Nancy de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja y varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Nancy, 32, lives in the village of Patay. There she started her family together with Teófilo, her husband of 13 years. They have 3 children who they care for in their own home. For some years they have cared for crops of peas and gladiolus flowers. Farming, their principal economic activity, has given them they money they needed to survive. But some time ago the opportunity arose to work on the construction of a hydroelectric dam. Her husband didn't want to miss this opportunity and now he is working, making extra money for their home. Meanwhile, Nancy took the reins of the home and caring for their crops. She plants them with a collective now that she doesn't have her husband's help, and she sells them in the wholesale market in the city of Tarma. Recently she also opened a candy store where she gets a little extra money which helps with school costs for her kids who study away from home because she wants to give them a good education. 

She belongs to the village bank "Picaflores de Patay" and this her 6th loan with MFP, where she hopes that the collaboration with all of you will allow her to continue working towards her goals. She promises to be punctual in her payments. Nancy will invest the requested money in the purchase of a bag of pea seeds and some sacks of natural fertilizer for the next planting.

loans.use: to buy a bag of pea seeds and some sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: 13 Lien Minh Hoang Truong Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phong operates a food stall selling fish, shrimp and frogs. She is requesting a loan to purchase equipment to catch fish, shrimp and frogs. Phong is 47 years old and married with four children. She is the leader of a five-member group, the 13 Lien Minh Hoang T. solidarity group. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with four dependents.

In 2011, Phong joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Phong has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Phong has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardships that Phong faces in her business are natural disasters and droughts.

In the future, Phong hopes to remodel her house, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase equipment to catch fish, shrimp and frogs.

loans.name: Nora

texts.es: Nora, es una mujer única siempre fuerte e imponente, ella tiene 44 años, y en compañía de su esposo Percy, salen adelante en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Patay. A pesar de que su esposo trabaja en otra ciudad y no tiene mayores necesidades, está trabajadora mujer le gusta ser independiente y luchadora. Hace 20 años que se dedica a la agricultura, donde comenzó junto a su esposo a sembrar productos oriundos de la zona como: flor de gladiolo, habas, arvejas y papa; pero hace algunos años Percy, se fue a trabajar fuera de la ciudad, dejando en manos de Nora el cuidado de sus terrenos agrícolas, los que gracias a su buen juicio logró sacar adelante. Una vez al mes viaja a la capital de país a vender sus cosechas. Por toda la capacidad que está demostrando desea para más adelante mejorar sus sembríos y así poder generar mejores ganancias. Por ahora está centrada en su próxima cosecha de papa y arveja, además de sentirse feliz de ayudar a personas como ella a salir adelante. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Picaflores de Patay”, y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde asume la secretaría de su asociación, siendo una integrante honesta y trabajadora. Por esa razón espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Nora de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja para lo que necesita también 3 sacos de fertilizantes naturales, con los que está segura comenzará con buen pie su siembra.
texts.en:
Nora is a unique woman, always strong and awe-inspiring. She is 44 and, together with her husband Percy, works to get ahead. They own a home in the village of Patay. In spite of the fact that her husband works in another city and they don't have great needs, this hardworking woman likes to be independent and strong. For 20 years she has worked in agriculture. She started with her husband planting crops native to the region like: gladiolus flowers, fava beans, peas and potatoes. Some years ago Percy went to work outside the city, leaving Nora in charge of the farm lands. Thanks to her good judgement she has done well. Once a month she travels to the country's capital to sell her harvest. For all of the capability she is showing, she wants in the future to improve her crops and generate more profits. For now she is focused on her next harvest of potatoes and peas.

She is happy to help others like her to get ahead. She belongs to the village bank "Picaflores de Patay" and this is her 5th loan with MFP. She is the secretary of her association, and is an honest and hardworking member. She hopes that all of you will support her as she continues towards her goals.

Nora will invest the money in the purchase of a bag of pea seeds for which she will need 3 sacks of natural fertilizer which will ensure a good start for her crop.

loans.use: to buy a bag of pea seeds and 3 sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: 5 Hai Son Hoang Truong Group

texts.en:
Mrs Binh operates a food stall selling fish, shrimp and frogs. She is requesting a loan to purchase equipment to catch fish, shrimp and frogs. Binh is 54 years old and married with four children. She is the leader of a four-member group, the 5 Hai Son Hoang Truong solidarity group. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a semi-urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents.


In 2011, Binh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Binh has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Binh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardships that Binh faces in her business are natural disasters and droughts.

In the future, Binh hopes to remodel her house, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase equipment to catch fish, shrimp and frogs.

loans.name: Mawar Group

texts.en:
Ni Komang lives in Pejarakan – Singaraja, North Bali. Though Ni Komang often helps her husband, she also raises pigs in her yard to supplement her family’s income.    

Ni Komang is the head of the Mawar group, which is made up of 10 neighbors from the same village. This is the group’s second loan with MUK.  With the Rp. 1,500,000 that Ni Komang receives, she will purchase two piglets and pig feed and to renovate the barn. She hopes that the piglets will grow healthy, which she will then be able to sell.  With her earnings, she plans to purchase more pigs. With the income from her pig raising, she hopes to be able to renovate her kitchen.

loans.use: To purchase two piglets and pig feed and to renovate the barn

loans.name: Melinda

texts.es: La siempre risueña Melinda, de 34 años, convive con Edberto, su esposo; ambos tienen 7 hijos, a los que alimentan y educan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de La Unión Leticia. Su rostro sereno refleja a la  mujer luchadora y emprendedora que es, ya que se dedica a diversas actividades. Durante el día se levanta muy temprano para preparar los ricos panes que vende diariamente a su comunidad, muy ágil ella inmediatamente prepara el desayuno de sus hijos para mandarlos a la escuela; hace ya 6 años que se dedica a ello, sus panes son ricos y muy solicitados. Pero la actividad que le trae más ganancias, es la venta de Leña. Melinda compra un lote de 100 árboles los cuales corta con ayuda de peones; posteriormente los vende al por mayor a los comerciantes que visitan su casa los fines de semana; le gusta mucho la venta de leña, “No se requiere mucho trabajo y tiene mayor rentabilidad”, afirma. Además de dedicarse al cuidado de su animales menores a los que alimenta diariamente con alfalfa. Más adelante quiere poner un pequeño taller, donde pueda hacer escaños, escritorios, muebles y demás productos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “La unión hace la fuerza” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, y está segura que su banco comunal le apoyara para seguir creciendo. Por ello espera de un pequeño préstamo para seguir adelante. Melinda de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un lote de 200 árboles con ello podrá abastecer la demanda que genera la compra de leña en su zona.
texts.en: The always smiling Melinda is 34 years old. She lives with her husband, Edberto. They have seven children who they take care of and educate in their own house located in the locality of La Unión Leticia. Her calm face reflects a motivated and enterprising woman who dedicates herself to various activities. During the day, she wakes up very early in order to prepare delicious breads that she sells in her community. Being very agile, she then immediately prepares breakfast for her children in order to send them off to school. She has done this activity for six years. Her breads are delicious and very popular. The activity that brings in the most profit is the sale of firewood. Melinda bought a lot with 100 trees that she cuts with the help of laborers. Then the wood is sold wholesale to merchants who visit her house during the weekends. She likes selling firewood a lot. “It doesn’t require much work and it is very profitable”, Melinda states. In addition, she raises small animals which are fed alfalfa daily. In the future, she wants to have a small workshop where she can make seats, desks, furniture and other products. She belongs to the “La unión hace la fuerza” communal bank and this is her ninth loan with MFP. She is sure that her communal bank will help her continue to grow. With this support, Melinda will invest the requested money in the purchase of a lot with 200 trees. With this, she can keep up with the demand that is generated by the purchase of firewood in her area.

loans.use: purchase a lot of 200 trees.

loans.name: Karya Murni Abadi Group

texts.en: I Gede lives in Pejarakan, Singaraja, North Bali. Though I Gede often helps his wife, he also raises pigs in his yard to supplement his family’s income. I Gede is the treasurer of the Karya Murni Abadi group, which is made up of 10 neighbors from the same village. This is the group’s third loan with MUK.  With the Rp. 1,000,000 that I Gede receives, he will purchase two local species piglets with a price of Rp. 150.000 each, renovate the barn and purchase pig feed.  He plans to sell the piglets after six months for use as suckling pigs.  With his earnings, he plans to purchase more pigs.  With the income from his pig raising, he hopes to be able to pay school fees.

loans.use: To purchase two piglets

loans.name: Hepolita

texts.en: Hepolita is 52 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married, has three grown children and earns a living by planting and harvesting bananas. She went into this line of work seven years ago and earns about PHP 8,000 month. Earlier this year, Hepolita applied her first loan from GDMPC. The loan was for PHP 20,000 and she used it to successfully expand her ability to grow bananas. Now she is applying for a second loan for the same purpose. She hopes for a good harvest which will allow her to earn enough money to continue expanding and improving her business.

loans.use: to expand her output of bananas.

loans.name: Sari Pertiwi Group

texts.en:
The Sari Pertiwi group is made up of 17 women who are neighbors in the same village in Melaya, West Bali. The group is seeking a loan of Rp. 20,000,000, and each member will receive Rp. 1,000,000 – Rp. 1,500,000.  The group was formed out of these women’s common interest in raising pigs to supplement the family income, and out of their interest in education on best practices for pig raising. This is their third loan with MUK.

Ni Luh is the head of the Sari Pertiwi group. She is married and has three children. Two of the children are married and the last is still in school. Ni Luh would like to help support her family with her pig raising business. She will use the loan to buy four piglets and pigs feed. She plans to sell the piglets after five months for use as fattening pigs. With the increase in household income, she hopes to be able to pay school fees.

loans.use: To buy four piglets and pig feed

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 46 years old and married with two children.

Merlinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a traveling sales business selling tobacco in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 49,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of tobacco to sell.

Merlinda has borrowed and paid back 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the tobacco business for 18 years and earns additional income from raising pigs and farming sugarcane.

Merlinda aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To purchase more tobacco to sell

loans.name: Sherlita

texts.en:
Sherlita is 65 years old and married with five children. Sherlita works very hard to provide for them.

Sherlita runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional goods to sell in her sari-sari store.

Sherlita has been in this business for 14 years and sells a variety of items such as bread, candies, spices, eggs, etc.. 

In the future, Sherlita would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: To buy additional goods to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase cattle to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Lucresia

texts.en: Lucresia is 49 years old and married. She lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines with her husband and grown child, and earns a living by running a sari-sari (or variety) store where she generates a monthly income of PHP 10,000. She has been in this line of work for three years and joined GDMPC in 2009 to try to expand her business. She is applying for a loan for PHP 10,000 to buy more groceries to sell to her customers. She will use the extra income she earns as a result of this loan to repair some damage to her store and increase her income by expanding her sales.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell to her customers.
